title: Fall Alert – My Medic Watch
description:
Fall Alert - My Medic Watch is a ground-breaking smartwatch app which uses proprietary and innovative algorithms to interpret data captured by smartwatch sensor technologies. By using innovative algorithms, it automatically detects if the wearer has a fall and activates immediate emergency assistance.

My Medic Watch provides monthly and yearly subscriptions which include a 30-day free trial.

We do not sell or provide smartwatches, but rather our app is compatible with many commercially available smartwatches, view our compatible smartwatch options at https://www.mymedicwatch.com/smartwatches/

Today, more and more people are choosing to live independently, in their own homes, aided by vital technology innovations like Fall Alert - My Medic Watch, which was validated by medical trials undertaken in Sydney. 

Fall Alert - My Medic Watch is designed to be downloaded to a wearable device. It can be worn by people of all ages who are prone to falls.

If the wearer does have a fall, Fall Alert - My Medic Watch automatically detects it and notifies all nominated caregivers, without the need for manual intervention, providing details of the user’s location. The app can also be activated manually by the wearer if they are feeling unwell and require assistance, simply by pressing a button on their smartwatch.

This process has four steps:

1. Smart Detection: As soon as a fall occurs, Fall Alert - My Medic Watch detects it using smartwatch sensors and an accurate algorithm.

2. Immediate Alert: The app then automatically sends notifications with the wearer’s GPS location to the nominated caregivers without the need for manual intervention based on workflows of escalation.

3. Reassurance for Everyone: All caregivers are sent updates of the progress, keeping everyone informed and reassured.

4. Real-Time Data: Included in the user’s subscription is access to real-time data for all related medical episodes. The user can also choose to give access to his or her doctor, so that their medical data can be reviewed securely, online.

Thanks to Fall Alert - My Medic Watch, those with a condition that makes them susceptible to falls, can continue to live independently in their own homes, with ultimate peace of mind.

App subscription information:

With the Fall Alert - My Medic Watch app subscriptions, the wearer has his/her smartwatch app running and benefits from being monitored all the time with automatic fall detection. These app subscriptions include automatic medical event app notifications to the patient and to the caregivers.

Please read below details about this subscription before purchasing it.

- Payment will be charged to the Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase

- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current month

- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current month, and identify the cost of the renewal

- Current subscription may not be cancelled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Google Play Account Settings after purchase

- You can refer to My Medic Watch Terms & Conditions (https://www.mymedicwatch.com/terms-conditions/) and our Privacy Policy (https://www.mymedicwatch.com/privacy-policy/)

- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that product, where applicable.

title: Birdhouse – for Epilepsy
description:
Simplify & organize your own care or someone else's by helping you identify seizure triggers, keep a medication log, evaluate diets, & ensure you're on the path to success.


Birdhouse for Epilepsy is the newest app from the creators of 5-Star Birdhouse for Autism. Birdhouse apps have been featured on Parents.com, HuffingtonPost, Smart Apps for Special Needs, Generation Rescue, Autism Speaks, The Friendship Circle, and more!


************************


Use Birdhouse for Epilepsy on smartphones and the web to keep everything about you and your family’s care in one safe, organized, & searchable place. 


Birdhouse provides a simple, convenient, and structured method for tracking and organizing important health information, such as seizures, triggers, medications, dietary considerations, sleeping habits, and more, to help you make more efficient and effective progress in managing Epilepsy.


Have this information at your fingertips anytime you need it, and share this information with anyone who needs to see it. Regain some control and sanity– we'll help you succeed.


************************


USE BIRDHOUSE TO:


– Record how, what, and when seizures occur, and when they don’t, so you can maintain an easy and convenient record of what happened


-Activate reminders to stay in control of your day


– Invite trusted people into your Birdhouse to share caregiving responsibility and accountability


- Create and share summaries with overviews of important background and health information


– Track sleep habits to see if/how it impacts seizure activity


– Document triggers and potential triggers to identify how/if/when they are associated with seizure activity


– Track food consumption to help identify associations with seizure activity


– Organize medication and supplement information so you know what needs to be administered, when, why, and in what dosage, and evaluate its effectiveness


– Reminders to take/give meds, and to mark down what was taken/given and when


– Organize information about doctors, specialists, and other contacts, and save appointment notes & other important information


– Track mood to determine its effect on seizure activity


– See how often and when you or your loved ones have seizures, and learn what associated factors may be present so you can prevent them in the future


– Recognize environmental factors that might be having an impact & view how seizure activity changes over time so you can prevent or anticipate seizure events in the future


– View 1 week, 4 weeks, or even several months at a time to visualize a new med's impact, how sleep & seizure activity correlate, and other enlightening insights into behavior & progress (web feature only)


– Provide a sense of control by better understanding trends, patterns, correlations, and challenges, to facilitates better, faster progress


************************


Individuals have used Birdhouse apps for all of the following and more, with great success:


– Autism
– ADD/ADHD
– Sensory Processing Disorder
– FAS
– PANDAS
– Anxiety
– Williams Syndrome
– Rhett Syndrome
– Cystic Fibrosis
– Cerebral Palsy
– Down Syndrome
– Dyslexia
– Fragile X
– Bipolar Disorder
– PDD-NOS
– Epilepsy
– Multiple Sclerosis


Other apps by Birdhouse include:
– Birdhouse for Autism
– Birdhouse for Special Needs
– Birdhouse for Teachers


************************


Head over to http://birdhousehq.com/epilepsy for a full rundown of features, as well as testimonials from families who’ve shared their success stories with us.


Feel free to email us at owl@birdhousehq.com with any questions– we’re human beings and we read every message that comes in!


From our nest to yours, 


The Birdhouse Team

title: EpApp
description:
EpApp has been designed to provide educational information about epilepsy along with self-management tools for adolescents living with epilepsy, their parents/carers, and the clinicians involved in their care.

The App does not replace the care of a treating Physician, but is a tool that teenagers and young adults can use to complement their treatment and help them better manage their epilepsy.

The Paediatric Epilepsy Network NSW (PENNSW) in association with the Sydney Children's Hospitals Network received funding support from NSW Health to develop EpApp. 

The mission of the Paediatric Epilepsy Network and the purpose of EpApp (and the associated website: www.pennsw.com.au) are to improve the standard of care and quality of life for each child or adolescent living with epilepsy across NSW. 

Members of the EpApp Editorial Committee and the PENNSW Editorial Committee authored the information available on this App, following rigorous consultation with key epilepsy personnel and families affected by epilepsy, and in reference to evidence-based literature.

title: Mirgi Samjho
description: In an Endeavour to help patients with epilepsy , Epilepsy care and Research Foundation, a unit of Triveni Devi Sureka Charitable Trust , is running a free epilepsy camp at Village Ratan Nagar, District Churu  since last 22 years every month and about 6000 patients are registered in camp and every time about 750 patients attend the camp from all over India. They are seen by neurologist and given free medicines for full one month every time. This camp is run under guidance of Dr.R.K.Sureka, Neuro physician and Ex Professor of SMS Medical  College , Jaipur who is also a state award winner and Limca book record holder 2016 for work in rural epilepsy. This mobile App “Mirgi Samjho “ is being launched by foundation as a part to help the epileptics in diagnosis , treatment and management , removal of myths and wrong believes, guidance for first Aid and Epilepsy and Pregnancy Registry. It  also provides material with public education and recent advancements and news in field of epilepsy.

title: iBrainEEG2
description:
Visualization of complex neuroimaging data such as functional connectivity and his relation to EEG is a challenge. Many different visualization solutions to view complex image data have been proposed. Some authors described 2-D and 3-D neuroimaging visualization methods for tractography and functional connectivity data. Others described an anaglyph method to view neuroradiological 3-D images. 

EEG is the standard diagnostic method for epilepsy, and the relation of EEG electrodes position and functional connectivity data could be of interest. Here we could download an Android app that shows the position of EEG 10-20 electrodes in relation to 7 standard functional connectivity networks.

iBraiNEEG (intrinsic Brain Networks and EEG electrodes) application: The user view a 3D transparent brain with 7 standard functional connectivity networks and EEG 10-20 electrodes as red spheres over the brain. The user could rotate the brain using onscreen controls, and by tapping each electrode, the name of it appears on screen. By tapping the three points at the left side of the screen, the name of each functional network will appear.

iBraiNEEG is an application tool that helps to analyze EEG data in relation to functional connectivity networks.

Ref: G.M Rojas, J.A. Fuentes, M. Gálvez. "Two Intrinsic Funtional Connectivity Visualization Applications: iBraiN and iBraiNEEG", 4th Biennial Conference on Resting State Brain Connectivity, Boston, USA, September 11-13 2014.

title: Epilepsy Diary 3 (Free)
description:
(Apologize for users who do not use Thai. Today, this app still launched only in Thai version.)
This app is for all who is epilepsy patient and their care givers. Epilepsy Diary, or a Mobile seizure calendar, is a mobile application to tracking patient seizure symptoms. The app is like a physician assistant helping the physician can accessed the severity of the symptom more closely with on time up-to-date data. It collects and sends useful patient information to cloud server and then, the server, forwards to physician's notebook. By which the physician will be alerted to look for any severe cases. It make your diary not just your own diary for keeping but it is also the real time interactive plan for tracking your seizure.  Thanks to Dr. Yotin Chinwalan and the colleagues who make it become true.

title: Epilepsy Inclusion
description:
- Epilepsy Inclusion is a mobile application developed by The Hong Kong Society

for Rehabilitation; supported by The Hong Kong Epilepsy Society; The Hong 

Kong Epilepsy Association and The Hong Kong Neurological Society. 

- It is a hand-held electronic health record and educational device on epilepsy, 

aiming at enhancing the self-management capabilities of persons with epilepsy, 

facilitate communication with medical professionals and understanding of 

epilepsy of the public to co-create an inclusive community.

- The functions of the Application include savable and printable personal medical 

history like seizure record charts, medication records and reminders for medical 

appointments; information on epilepsy, medications, community resources and 

the likewise.  

- Persons with epilepsy can communicate with medical professionals, family 

members and their friends on their health condition, attaining a better treatment 

outcome and supportive network.  

- Besides, it is also a social media for the public to know more about epilepsy and 

its first-aid management to build a caring and inclusive community.

title: Epilepsy Reviews
description:
Epilepsy Video Reviews es una aplicación que tiene la finalidad de hacer llegar los contenidos más importantes de los congresos internacionales a través de revisiones de los temas más destacados con la publicación diaria de contenidos multimedia.

Para poder utilizar la aplicación es necesario estar en posesión de un código de invitación o en su defecto hacer la solicitud de uno que le será facilitado en caso de cumplir con los requisitos necesarios.

La información contenida en esta aplicación está exclusivamente dirigida a Profesionales Sanitarios facultados para prescribir o dispensar medicamentos, en tanto que se requiere una formación especializada para su correcta interpretación. Toda la información contenida y generada por esta aplicación es proporcionada solamente para fines educativos. Esta información no debería ser utilizada para diagnósticos o tratamientos de ningún problema de salud o enfermedad. ESTA INFORMACIÓN NO TIENE LA INTENCIÓN DE SUSTITUIR EL DIAGNÓSTICO CLÍNICO, O GUIAR EL CUIDADO INDIVIDUAL DE PACIENTES de ninguna manera.

El usuario es notificado por la presenta, de que la información contenida aquí podría no satisfacer sus necesidades.

title: Strobe Light
description:
An amazing Strobe Light for your Android!  Uses your phone's LED camera flash to simulate a strobe light effect.  Flashes the screen white and black if it cannot use the flash.  Never be caught at a rave without it!

How many times have you been at a party when it's getting late, people are getting tired, and things are starting to die down?  Have you ever sat at home and yearned for the days of disco to return?  Have you ever wanted to give yourself a seizure to get out of class (please don't)?  If you answered Yes to any of those, then a strobe light can fit the bill.  Use strobe light at parties, at home, at the club, at school, or anywhere you think a strobe light could set the mood.

Picture this.  You are having a party at your house.  The cute girl from your biology class is there.  Suddenly your bro says 'Hey let's turn this into a rave!'  Biology girl is feeling it.  But sadly, you don't have a strobe light!  Your guests leave in disgust and you are mocked for the rest of the school year. 

It doesn't have to end that way.  With Strobe Light app, simply turn on the switch, place your phone on the table, and let the party begin.  Mileage may vary by phone type and flash brightness.  Should generally be bright enough to host a rave for 15-20 people.  

Tip: When you press the music button, you will get a hip techno music beat to liven the mood, but you can also listen to your own tracks stored on your SD card.  While the music is playing, simply tap on the song name (it will say techno) and it will pick music from your sd card!  Supports mp3 and ogg music formats (I haven't tried any others).

Please leave comments with suggestions on how to make the app better.  This app is for you guys so help me make strobe light the best party app on the market!

comments: Would like to have more control of slow er speeds to be used for timing music. It must be very accurate. Tempo of between 40 to 180 beats per minute. Would be of great interest to musicians.
Malware/adware. I need to use this to signal a family member. Ad pops up with a timer. The timer almost got my family member killed. I recommend a different app for time sensitive uses.

Great strobe actually works through flash light other just use the screen light flashing the screen backround but this uses the flash light only

title: Mate for Embrace watch
description:
The Mate App visualizes Embrace data, enabling you to view your day at a glance. Set medication reminders and quickly get a holistic view of your daily regime including how much you’re moving and resting, your medication adherence, and any seizures that may have occurred.

MATE FEATURES
• Maintain an accurate seizure diary: Seizures detected by Embrace are automatically logged, and you can add any others you may experience. Add notes to seizures such as how you were feeling and what you were doing before the seizure.
• Discover insights about your rest: Get detailed stats such as duration, interruptions, turns and tosses. Advanced analysis lets you see how efficient your night's rest was, and compare it with your weekly average to identify patterns. 
• Keep track of how much you move: Automatic activity recognition distinguishes between run, walk, and sport. You can also see the intensity of your physical activity and stats such as duration, distance, steps, and total active time.
• Medication reminders: Take control of your medication management by using the medication reminders designed for people with epilepsy. Set detailed reminders so that you can remember to take your medicines on time. View all your seizure, rest and physical activity stats; alongside your medication compliance at a glance.

CONNECT WITH US
Web - http://www.empatica.com
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/empatica
Twitter - @Empatica
Instagram - @empatica_wearables
Support - support@empatica.com or +1 (866) 739-2049 (Monday - Friday from 9:00am to 1:00pm EST).

recentChanges:
This release introduces one of our most requested features: the medication reminders

Now you can set detailed reminders for taking your medication on time, along with notes to remember how each dosage should be taken, and whether some doses were skipped or taken late.
See your medication adherence alongside your seizures, rest and physical activity information on the Mate wheel.

We’d love to hear your feedback regarding the new updates. Let us know what you think at support@empatica.com
comments: I've sent in a support ticket, I've been reporting daily that movement and sleep data is no longer being recorded. I've had this under a month. This Is either a bad app or faulty embrace2. I'm not paying a subscription after my trial if this not fixed, I need all its features, not just some of them. It's a very expensive product to be left broken.

This app used to be highly informative, with information presented in a helpful and intuitive way. in the most recent upgrade, the interface uses lurid colours in childish bubblegum fonts, and the information is difficult to interpret. M ost offensive are the rounded ends of the data bars which serve no useful purpose. Previously, sleep patterns were extremely well presented. now it is less functional and the presentation is very unhelpful. A very negative upgrade

I see why I'm getting the "Oh Snap/No Data" message all of a sudden...the app thinks it's Dec 2017! Yikes. The watch is a great idea, but the apps are bare bones and unreliable. The company should dedicate some of their marketing budget to improving service for those who've already bought the watch. The bad reviews will evetually negate the impressive sounding "FDA Clearance."

unfortunately I dont love the newer version of this app. I have noticed a lot of discrepancies in the information on the logged day such as sleep and waking times and activity. I personally track my sleep very closely due to my epilepsy issues and the new format makes the viewing of your quality of sleep and sleep patterns much more difficult to read. over all I would say that the previous format was more user friendly and easier to navigate.

This app is a hit and a miss.. I need it to monitor sleep and nocturnal seizures for my son and 90% of the time, there's "no recorded data" but the phone is connected to the watch without issue. And the support people for this app suck, I've sent 2 emails have have gotten NO RESPONSE

title: Neurology Exam Review & Practice Questions
description:
Neurology Exam Review Q&A is a comprehensive self-assessment tool with 900+ practice questions that highlight key concepts and must-know information in the neurology specialty. Designed for students, residents, and attending physicians, Neurology Exam Review Q&A is perfect for focused exam review or ongoing self-assessment!

Brought to you by Springer Publishing, and written by renown neurologist, Jonathan Howard, MD, this app provides you with all the great content from Dr. Howard’s book, Neurology Q&A Review, and then doubles the challenge with an additional 700 Q&A not found in the book.

Install the free version today and jump-start your studying! We have provided a limited free version of the content that you can try before deciding to upgrade. 

Get your best value by upgrading to the Premium Version with a one time, in-app purchase. The Premium Version includes lifetime access to:

• 1800+ practice questions with explanations
• Thousands of images demonstrating what you’ll see in your practice
• Unlimited access to all 17 subject areas, including: 
       • Central Nervous System Anatomy
       • Vascular Disease
       • Critical Care Neurology
       • Infections of the Nervous System
       • Neoplastic Diseases
       • Dementia
       • Retina and Optic Nerve Diseases
       • Epilepsy
       • Psychiatry
       • Neurogenetics and Pediatric Neurology
       • Many more Premium categories!
• Detailed results tracking that shows your strongest and weakest areas

Neurology Exam Review Q&A is the perfect on-the-go study solution to help you prepare for your neurology exam. Get started for free! 

Call us at 319-246-5299 and email us at medical@hltcorp.com with any questions.

© Springer Publishing

title: Epilepsy Help
description:
With this app, we have compiled ancient remedies for epilepsy. We give you only the successful ones. Here is the table of contents:

--Definition
--Epilepsy symptoms
--Traditional home and folk remedies
--Bach Flower Remedies
--Herbalism
--Chinese Herbalism
--Homeopathy
--Ayurveda
--Aromatherapy
--Vitamins and Minerals

How to use this app?

There are three important buttons:

-- Your Therapy

-- Symptoms

-- Description of remedies 

First tap on Symptoms and then tap on one or more icons that say Add to Your Therapy. You will see a short message ("toast") that the symptom is entered into the therapy.

You can select all symptoms that you want now or later, it does not matter. Once entered, you will be able to delete the chosen symptom with a click of a button.

Then tap on various groups of remedies. Typically, these will be Homeopathy, Bach Flower remedies, Ayurveda and others. Visit these therapies and tap on icon to select the remedy and enter it into the chosen therapy. 

Finally, tap on Your Therapy. You will see a list of symptoms (in orange) mixed with a list of remedies (green) that you have selected. Taken together, the symptoms and the remedies form your therapy. Now all you have to do is obtain the remedies and start the process of eventual improvement of your health. 

The whole process takes less than five minutes but will cut down the time to search for remedies. We have chosen only the proven remedies from various types of healing so let this be a firm base for further research of yours. In the meantime, you undertook the first step towards the change of your life. 

If the symptoms change, you may repeat the entire process. 

The app is free and is supported by (hopefully non intrusive) ads. This app belongs to a wider group of apps that may be able to help you improve your health. Please visit the option Other apps to see what else do we have.

title: Epilepsia
description:
Epilepsia is the leading, most authoritative source for current clinical and research results on all aspects of epilepsy. The journal presents subscribers with scientific evidence and clinical methodology in clinical neurology, neurophysiology, molecular biology, neuroimaging, neurochemistry, neurosurgery, pharmacology, neuroepidemiology, and therapeutic trials.

Each monthly issue features original peer reviewed articles, brief communications, editorial commentaries, meeting reports, and announcements

Epilepsia is the official journal of the International League Against Epilepsy (ILAE).

The ILAE comprises more than 100 national chapters. Its goals are to advance and disseminate knowledge about epilepsy, promote research, education and training and improve services and care for patients, especially by prevention, diagnosis and treatment.

title: Daybook - Diary, Journal, Note, Mood Tracker
description:
Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way.

WHY USE DAYBOOK? 

• SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way and record memories in an organized manner.

•  GUIDED JOURNAL:  Supports guided journal for tracking mood and activities, Mental Health Journal for managing stress and anxiety, Handwriting Scanner, Gratitude journal, self-improvement, and more.

•  JOURNAL INSIGHTS:  Gather insights using mood analyzer from your activity log & mood log.

• SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected with diary with lock. 

• EASY-TO-USE:  It's easy-to-use journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience — nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily.


• FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on.

• SPEAK TO WRITE JOURNAL DIARY : Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI.

• MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases.
- As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life.
- As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly. 
- As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app.
- As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal.
- As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save!
- As a Class notebook: For educational purposes, use it as -  homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures
- As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly. 
- As a pocket diary and a note keeper app: Record your life journey. Daybook is a life diary that works with multiple platforms such as Web, mobile, through voice Assistance.

Standout features:

- Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance. 
- Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant


Upcoming integration:

We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app.

- Daily Mood tracker for the diary
- Search based on tags or location
- Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup


To know more, visit us at https://daybook.app.

Follow us on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/DayBook.diary/


Feedback:
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at daybook.diary@gmail.com

comments: Really Nice... and Cool Features... but for a Price I was excited to start using this app. There have been many times where I get ideas for art projects, and experience feelings that can only be described in the given moment. It's easy to add entries and do quick check-ins multiple times a day and I was psyched to see the other journaling ideas... Until I saw that you have to spend $30/year for those features. So cruel to ad them just to say, "Pay us! Minus that, I would give it 5 stars.

The app has more intelligent offer than I expected. First, it is a great interface to use on any devices, web, phone, tablet so I'm happy to be able to access it any time. The note is simply minimal and well organized. I'm surprised that there are actually promt checkins and guided templates for different topics for journaling. I'm using more than I intended.

So far so good very simple to use and the design and layout is appealing. Better than most I've tried recently. Option to upload multiple photos in one go rather than individually would be handy, and the ability to upload videos would be nice. Great experience so far though.

it is a really good app, ive only just started using it and is very good compared to other diarys and mood journals ive had in the past. it is good even without the subscription as you have access to the diary feature, mood board and everything. the only reason im giving 4 stars is because i feel that the mood board could be a bit more in depth that just, "pick a face, what activities made you feel this way, any other notes." i feel it needs a little more but it is a great app and i recomend it!

Pay to use... Listen, If you guy offer this for free with a very LIGHT ad presence so you can get paid for the work out into creating this app, fine. If you want to offer the option to pay like 1 or 2 dollars to get rid of the ads, fine. Even if you roll out new amazing content, I mean serious content that you can't find elsewhere, not fonts, themes, backgrounds, photo insertion or that simple bs. But telling me to pay over $5 monthly when I can buy a $1 notebook? No, that is money grubbing.

title: Relax Lamp (FREE)
description:
Lie down in your bed, turn down the lights and enjoy a unique color experience, together with a relaxing background sound.

This app can be used as a sleeping aid, to stimulate your mood, as a meditation assistant, a stress reducer or simply as an ambient light.

*** This app is supported by ads, you can remove them and help further development using in-app purchase ***

*** NEW : Binaural Beats ***
We have added a new section that allows you to generate binaural beats combining them with color therapy. You can customize every parameter individually or just the desidered state of mind. Use with headphones only!

WARNING: If you currently have or previously had epilepsy/seizures or heart problems, DO NOT use the Binaural Beats feature! 
Combinations:
Combinations are a new way to experience color and music together, trying to recreate exciting natural wonder and memories with your device! 
Following combinations are included:
* Candle (candle effect with a nice background sound)
* Dawn (recreate the dawn color sequence)
* Sunset (recreate the sunset color sequence)
* Thunderstorm (Lightning effect generated using the flash of your camera)
* Fire (recreate the fireplace effect)
* Ocean (brings you at the beach)
* Old-Television (constant white-noising with old television noise)
* Forest (recreate the jungle color sequence)
* Fireworks (sparkling colors)

Relax Lamp includes:
* User-defined variable transition speed between colors
* Color-picker (starting color)
* Adaptive Brightness
* Auto-closing timer
* Various sounds to choose from via Sounds selection

Some technical specs:
The color generation algorithm uses the phases between the RGB components, which we express as sinusoidal curves. This allows Relax Lamp to reproduce a fluid and unique color sequence depending on the starting color you choose.

The “Adaptive Brightness” is a unique feature (still in its experimental phase) designed to compensate for different eye sensitivities to certain colors during low-light conditions (scotopic vision). We tried to eliminate the misleading feeling that for some colors, the perceived intensity is far greater compared to others. This lets you enjoy a smoother color experience.


NOTE: The Internet connection is only used to submit an error report should the application crash unexpectedly. The application does NOT rely on an internet connection in order to work.

If you encounter any problems, rather than simply rate the app with one star, please let us know what’s wrong using the support link. This will help us deliver an even better product. Thank you.

Combinations are a new way to experience color and music together, trying to recreate exciting natural wonder and memories with your device!
Following combinations are included:
* Candle (candle effect with a nice background sound)
* Dawn (recreate the dawn color sequence)
* Sunset (recreate the sunset color sequence)
* Thunderstorm (Lightning effect generated using the flash of your camera)
* Fire (recreate the fireplace effect)
* Ocean (brings you at the beach)
* Old-Television (constant white-noising with old television noise)
* Forest (recreate the jungle color sequence)
* Fireworks (sparkling colors)

Relax Lamp includes:
* User-defined variable transition speed between colors
* Color-picker (starting color)
* Adaptive Brightness
* Auto-closing timer
* Various sounds to choose from via Sounds selection

Some technical specs:
The color generation algorithm uses the phases between the RGB components, which we express as sinusoidal curves. This allows Relax Lamp to reproduce a fluid and unique color sequence depending on the starting color you choose.

The “Adaptive Brightness” is a unique feature (still in its experimental phase) designed to compensate for different eye sensitivities to certain colors during low-light conditions (scotopic vision). We tried to eliminate the misleading feeling that for some colors, the perceived intensity is far greater compared to others. This lets you enjoy a smoother color experience.


NOTE: The Internet connection is only used to submit an error report should the application crash unexpectedly. The application does NOT rely on an internet connection in order to work.

If you encounter any problems, rather than simply rate the app with one star, please let us know what’s wrong using the support link. This will help us deliver an even better product. Thank you.
summary: Enjoy a colorful and melodic experience!
recentChanges:
Replace LITE edition because of Google Removal
Added fixed color lamp
Fixed many minor issues
comments: Very useful for sound therapy. For calming down the mind

I really enjoy using Relax Lamp when i am trying to sleep at night. It has a lot of great features and sounds that are soothing & calming. I only wish there were a few more soft piano & bell type sounds.

I'm blown away by the perks you have on this one. Uses your flash for lightening storms that's epic no other mood lamp does what your lamp does thank you for this I'm spreading this lamp around my network of friends
I like this app the colors are cute, niceittle color lamps. :)
Very silly, but great fun

title: +Control Diario Epilepsia
description:
Con el objetivo de mejorar la calidad de vida a pacientes con epilepsia, +Control Diario Epilepsia ofrece herramientas para realizar un preciso monitoreo de la enfermedad, así como funcionalidades para notificar emergencias. Con +Control Diario Epilepsia es posible registrar fecha y hora de las crisis, administración de medicamentos, grabación de videos y registro de información relevante le ayudará a tu médico a prescribir el tratamiento más adecuado.
Más Información:

Emergencia
* Notifica una emergencia con un sólo toque
* Envía de manera automática un mensaje de emergencia junto tu ubicación en google maps.
* Marca de manera directa a tus contactos de emergencia

Primeros Auxilios
* Ten a la mano información importante
* Accede a información importante para situaciones de emergencia.
* Graba un video de emergencia y guardalo en el diario de tu aplicación

Expediente
* Almacena toda la información relacionada a tu epilepsia

Lleva un control de tu medicación
* Almacena información de tu epilepsia para compartirla en situaciones de emergencia
* Personaliza tu aplicación.

Diario
* Registra y administra toda la información necesaria para controlar tu epilepsia 

Registra tus consultas médicas
* Lleva una bitácora de tus días
* Registra datos de tus crisis y lleva un control


Guía Médica
* Conoce más acerca de la epilepsia
* Accede a una variedad de temas importantes acerca de la epilepsia

title: ICE - In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact Card
description:
ICE - In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact Card is a very useful app and can even prove to be a lifesaver in an emergency situation. Using this app, you can store emergency contacts and other essential information which can help save your life if you were to be in an unfortunate accident.

Using ICE- In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact card, you can create your medical contact card directly on your phone which will be available on the screen without the need to unlock the phone. With the personal details that will be available on the emergency contacts card including medical conditions, blood group, emergency contact number, etc, you will be able to receive the assistance that you may need in an emergency situation. Besides this basic information, you also have the option to add additional information such as allergies, medicine, and disease.

With ICE App, the first time responders will easily have access to all the information they will need to provide you with medical emergency help and also to call your loved ones. The app also includes a ‘secret’ section which will be encrypted with a passcode so that only a loved one who has the passcode may have access to the information inside it. The screen will display a message directing the responders to contact the person with the passcode. Other details like your vaccine history, physician contact and insurance may also be stored in the app and may come in handy when receiving medical emergency help.   


How will responders access the information?
The responders will be redirected to the emergency medical ID or information stored in the app when they tap the notification bar on the lock screen of your phone.  

How to show Notification/Floating icon over locked screen?
Under More tab, you will see Notification / Lock Screen feature and clicking on that you can enable or disable the each feature from lock screen. You must provide some permission to allow this. Notification is by default. 

Which languages are supported?
The Medical ID ICE App currently offers support for 7 languages: English, Italian, German, Dutch, French, Turkish and Polish but will include more upon request from the users.  

How can the premium version be unlocked?
Go to the ‘More’ tab on ICE Emergency app and tap ‘upgrade to premium’. You will just need to pay USD $8 to receive access to unlimited features on the ICE - In Case of Emergency.

What does the premium version offer?
Among the unlimited features that you have access to with the premium version of ICE Emergency app, here are the most notable ones:
●	You can store a 30-second voice recording which will appear on the profile page. This feature will be an additional asset if you were in need of medical emergency help.
●	By clicking on the ‘App lock’ option, you can enable or disable the app lock. This will restrict the user from editing the information unless he or she has the pin or provides fingerprint verification. 
●	You can also back up the medical contact card from the ICE Emergency app into your computer or on Google drive. The information may also be restored onto the Medical ID ICE App from these locations. 

Keeping yourself fully prepared for an emergency situation or accidents never hurts. The sooner you have your digital medical contact card ready, the better. So what are you waiting for? It will barely take a minute to find ICE - In case of emergency App on play store and install it on your phone. 

=========
SAY HELLO
=========

Feel free to comment or email(techxonia@gmail.com) in case you have any queries or suggestions. Your support will help us improve the app and serve you better.

comments: Very detailed and user friendly app. 1 of...if not THE best "In Case of Emergency" app available. Works great as a free app, and even better when purchased. Free app is still useful even without full features, I recommend this and having worked in the ambulance service I wish people would use or have this on their phones more often, saving time is saving lives, this app could one day do just that. Developer is also friendly, helpful and punctual with responding to questions or help.

FORCED TO GIVE A 🌟. 😡 COMPLETELY USELESS APP...unless you only have one allergy, take only one prescription, no contacts...etc. As soon as you try to enter a second listing of anything, you get a pop-up about upgrading to (and paying for) the premium version. If you have only one medication or allergy & no emergency contacts...this is the app for you. However, if you live in the real world...pass this one by. Looking for the app I had on my old phone ..unlimited entrees & 100% free.

ICE – In Case of Emergency, the name says it all. This is an incredibly awesome application! In case of any emergency situation, this application can be used as a medical contact card as well as it can also be useful to reach out to the emergency contacts if needed. It helps a lot and its literally Awesome!

ICE - In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact Card is a very fabulous and amazing app. It is user friendly and easy to use. I like its all features mostly include Emergency Contacts and Medical Emergency Help. Brilliant app. This app is incredible! Thank you very much for your great service.

title: Epilepsy Board Review 2017
description:
The Epilepsy Board Review 2017 mobile application allows you to view presentations, posters, speaker details, and exhibitors from the conference. Users can take notes adjacent available presentation slides and draw directly on slides inside the app. Note-taking is also available in the exhibitors module. 

Additionally, users can share information with attendees and colleagues with in app messaging, tweeting and emailing.

title: EPIDES: An interactive app about epilepsy.
description:
A quiz in the form of a game where you move through the 
cities of the countries involved in the DESIRE project. At each city you 
are asked a series of questions about epilepsy which have to be answered 
correctly in order to proceed to the next city. You win the game once 
you have passed through all the cities.

title: myChildren's
description:
The MyChildren’s app from Nationwide Children’s Hospital allows you to keep track of all your children’s healthcare needs. Specialty tools for kids who have diabetes, Epilepsy or are in a NICU facility. Made for any child, anywhere.
Key Features Include:
-	The app easily creates a timeline for all immunizations your child needs
-	A growth chart for each child
-	An area for your docs and services you use
-	Provides age-appropriate wellness tips for each child 

Urgent Care Wait times
 - If you live in Central Ohio you can also get quick access to Nationwide Children’s facilities and live wait times!

 Medication tracking tool
-Search, add, and track medications for each child
-Get notified when it is time to refill your medication
-Set alarms and receive notifications when it is time to take your meds
 - Easy access medication reference materials

Diabetes Toolkit
-View enhanced insulin calculations to better manage your child's diabetes. If insulin adjustment is needed, the calculator will determine which insulin to adjust and change insulin dose
-Track your entries by time of day, week, month or year
-Separate journal entries by meal type
-Setup reminders to help you remember to make your journal entry

Epilepsy Toolkit
-Log your child’s seizures easily with the new Seizure Log
-Fill out your child’s Seizure Action Plan, which is their EMERGENCY medicine dosage and it can be easily shared with friends, school nurse or any of your child’s caretakers
-Set reminders for each medication to let you know when to take and refill your meds
-Use the new checklist feature as a quick reference guide to help you with your next physician appointment
-Browse a robust amount of useful and educational Epilepsy content

comments: Loved it , used this too chart my sons feedings ie how much he drank, the time. And track when he would sleep and for how long, his weight, lenght ,etc , and when he got his meds as I did this during his NICU stay from thanksiving '19 -12/23/19 , I stayed everyday & Night w him i didnt really need to chart all that really but felt better doing it for my own good, awesome app and id recommend it too other mommys!

MyChart by Epic is superior. You'll have access to your children's upcoming appointments, shot records and you can even schedule doctor visits. This myChidrens app is a little scammy because you have to put in your child's information and it doesn't provide access to your appointments.
Does not accept same log in as online account or link children already on account.
it currently has been given me issues...not opening, not allowing me to sign in, freezing.
This App is ridiculously hard to get into if you've forgotten or lost your log in info. I don't know one human on earth that would want access to MY child's health info EXCEPT for me.

title: EpilepsyAdvocate
description:
Introducing the Epilepsy Advocate app, a resource to help you get inspired, set your goals, find support on your journey of living with epilepsy.

The Epilepsy Advocate app includes:

• Inspiring personal stories from people making a difference in the epilepsy community
• Educational articles, with tips and ideas to help you handle your  epilepsy journey
• Tools to help you set your goals, stick to them and share your success
• A select list of websites where you can find information and support
• An interactive article finder to select the perfect story for you

We’d love to hear your feedback! Please review the app and let us know your thoughts.

EpilepsyAdvocate and Strength In Numbers are trademarks of the UCB Group of Companies, © 2015 UCB, Inc. Smyrna, GA 30080. All other trademarks are the property of their respective holders.

This app is intended for use by U.S. residents only. By downloading this app, you indicate that you are a U.S. resident.

title: Soterria Seizure Alert
description:
Soterria Seizure Alert helps give you and your caregivers peace of mind by allowing you to easily alert friends and family if you are about to have a seizure.

With one click on your Android watch or phone, Soterria Seizure Alert records the movement pattern of your seizure and, every 30 seconds, texts your location and how long you've been having the seizure, to your list of up to 25 caregivers. The app also gives an audio alert to anyone nearby - with instructions on how to provide you assistance.   You can even add 911 emergency services as one of your caregivers - so they can also receive a text and location.  The app continues to send texts every 30 seconds until the app is turned off by drawing a pattern on the screen. 

The alert begins in a non-intrusive way - by asking how you are doing - to give you a chance to interrupt the alerting process if you accidentally hit the seizure button - before the text alerts go out.

The motion of your seizure is recorded onto our server where, in our upcoming version, algorithms are tailored so that the app (using your Android watch - and to a more limited extent your Android phone) can automatically detect that you're having a seizure (versus walking, biking, dancing, etc.) and send the alerts without you having to push the seizure button.

Soterria Seizure Alert works with any Android smart phone and any Android watch.   The watch is optional - but when the app is able to detect seizures, it will detect them much more accurately if you are also wearing an Android watch.   By wearing an Android watch now, you will be helping us build an even more accurate seizure detection application.

Thank you!

The Soterria Development Team

comments: I am so happy to have found this app for my phone! This app has put my fiends and family at ease and given them PEACE OF MIND so I can go for walks by myself to be more safe until I get my service dog;and even then Will have had to unfortunately deploy the button a couple times but the text with address or closest location and the estimated time of seizure is amazing! I went through and added EMS 911 TO my care team and when I checked my texts they responded snd quickly,! Great app!! I will continue to use!
Can you tell me how to download this to my Samsung smart watch Gear2. We picked this watch because it can make emergency calls and text without being connected to a phone.

Use to be a great app. Can never log in and app doesn't do anything anymore. Even uninstalled and reinstalled. Had to find another app so I would have something, but nothing compares to this app the 1st time I installed it. Very disappointed.

Worked the first month and stopped working when I needed it. I tried restarting, and reinstalled. Still won't work...... I want to add something else to the programmer or to whom it may concern this app helped many people and made them feel safe so if you stopped or gave up on this app inform the people that downloaded it so they will not trust there health or maybe there life on a broken app

When I clicked in the link to confirm I could be sent seizure alerts from my son's phone, it sent me to a link that has me download the app but my son never received a response. When I emailed the creator of the app to ask for help, he never emailed back. Have no idea if it works.

title: Yeditepe Epilepsisiz
description:
İçeriği Yeditepe Üniversitesi Hastanesi uzmanları tarafından hazırlanan “Yeditepe Epilepsisiz” 

uygulaması ücretsiz olarak indirebilirsiniz.


Bu uygulama ile yapabilecekleriniz:

 • “Epilepsi Günlüğü” bölümü ile hasta ya da hastalık şüphesi olan kişinin geçirdiği epilepsi 

nöbetleri hakkında gün, saat, süre, kriz türü gibi özellikleri ekleyerek notlar tutabileceksiniz,

 • “Kriz Kaydı” özelliği ile kişinin geçirdiği epilepsi nöbetinin video kaydı ve bu nöbet hakkında 

diğer özellikleri (kriz türü, süresi, notlar) arşivde tutularak “Epilepsi Günlüğü” bölümüne kayıt 

edilebileceksiniz,

 • Uygulamaya profil bölümünden kaydolarak, kişisel bilgiler ve epilepsi hastalığı hakkında 

bilgilerinizi ekleyebilirsiniz, 

 • Uygulamaya kayıt olduktan sonra aynı kullanıcı ismi ve parola ile tüm verilerinize 

www.yeditepeepilepsisiz.com adresindeki web sitesinden de ulaşabileceksiniz,

 • Acil arama bölümüne istediğiniz bir kişi ya da kurumun telefonun kaydederek uygulama 

üzerinden kısa erişim sağlayabileceksiniz,

 • Haberler bölümü ile epilepsi hakkında gerçekleştirilen sosyal aktiviteler, tedaviler hakkında 

yenilikler gibi konulardan haberdar olunabileceksiniz,

 • Epilepsi Nedir? Bölümü ile hastalık hakkında teşhis ve tedavi konusunda detaylı bilgi sahibi 

olunabileceksiniz,

 • Epilepsi Farkındalığı bölümü ile toplumda oldukça yaygın olan epilepsi hastalığı konusunda 

farkındalık yaratmak için yapılan çalışmalardan haberdar olabileceksiniz,

 • Hakkımızda bölümü ile Yeditepe Üniversitesi Hastanesi doktorlarının CV’sine ulaşıp, hastane 

hakkında bilgi alabileceksiniz.


Eğitimlerini Türkiye ve dünyanın seçkin tıp fakültelerinde tamamlamış, alanlarında uzman olan doktor 

ve diğer sağlık çalışanlarına, yüksek standartlarda teknoloji ve alt yapıya sahip Yeditepe Üniversitesi 

Hastanesi, “Yeditepe Epilepsisiz” uygulamasını sunar.

www.yeditepeepilepsisiz.com adresindeki web sitesinden de ulaşabileceksiniz,

• Acil arama bölümüne istediğiniz bir kişi ya da kurumun telefonun kaydederek uygulama

üzerinden kısa erişim sağlayabileceksiniz,

• Haberler bölümü ile epilepsi hakkında gerçekleştirilen sosyal aktiviteler, tedaviler hakkında

yenilikler gibi konulardan haberdar olunabileceksiniz,

• Epilepsi Nedir? Bölümü ile hastalık hakkında teşhis ve tedavi konusunda detaylı bilgi sahibi

olunabileceksiniz,

• Epilepsi Farkındalığı bölümü ile toplumda oldukça yaygın olan epilepsi hastalığı konusunda

farkındalık yaratmak için yapılan çalışmalardan haberdar olabileceksiniz,

• Hakkımızda bölümü ile Yeditepe Üniversitesi Hastanesi doktorlarının CV’sine ulaşıp, hastane

hakkında bilgi alabileceksiniz.


Eğitimlerini Türkiye ve dünyanın seçkin tıp fakültelerinde tamamlamış, alanlarında uzman olan doktor

ve diğer sağlık çalışanlarına, yüksek standartlarda teknoloji ve alt yapıya sahip Yeditepe Üniversitesi

Hastanesi, “Yeditepe Epilepsisiz” uygulamasını sunar.

title: EpiSense
description:
Mobile and wearable technologies offer new opportunities for supporting epilepsy self-management.

The purpose of the study is to investigate new mobile and health tracking tools for documenting seizures and other health data between appointments, enabling patient outreach and increasing patient skills in preparation for adult self-care. 

Please login to create your account. Please feel free to contact our study coordinator with any questions. bidwej@gatech.edu

title: Symptom Tracker & Medicine, Health Symptoms Diary
description:
💊CareClinic is more than a health symptom tracker or symptoms diary app. CareClinic is your daily all-in-one Health & Wellness App that helps you measure, learn, and improve your health. 

👨‍⚕️CareClinic helps you never forget your meds or pills again! This is a must-have medication tracker and reminder app for your health & wellness.  Don’t put your loved ones at risk by missing a pill or tablet and over dosing due to forgetfulness. 

CareClinic works well for medication management, people also use it as a headache tracker, symptom tracker and symptoms diary or journal. Track vitamins, supplements, birth control, conditions, medication, symptoms, nutrition, activity, daily vitals, therapies, pregnancy, baby symptoms, notes and automatically discover correlations & triggers.


👪Reasons People Choose Us

✔️CREATE A CARE PLAN -- Used as a treatment & pill organizer 📅
- Don’t create a just a medication list. Add Drugs, Meds, Vitamins, Minerals, Natural Remedies, Therapies, Fitness & Nutrition as part of your care plan
- Built in Drugs & Supplements database
- Set dose form, dose color & set medicine reminders quickly

✔️SCHEDULE MEDICATION REMINDERS ⏰
- Set pill reminders, appointments, refill reminders, vitamin reminders or supplement trackers
- Set reminders for entire regimens or specifics like contraceptive pill
- Mark medication reminders as Taken or Snooze
- See adherence reports from the pill tracker when you mark drugs as taken
- Medicine Reminders can automatically adjust to new time zones

✔️DAILY CHECK-IN DIARY 📖
- Check-in to record your treatment progress alongside medication reminders. 
- Include PRN, Photos, Weight, Sleep, Blood Pressure, Energy, Memory, Mood, Pain Log, Blood Pressure, Pulse & Temperature
- Log Therapies: Meditation, Mindfulness, CBT, LLLT, Fitness

✔️MULTIPLE USES: TRACK SYMPTOMS, TRACK GOALS, HABITS, HEADACHES, MIGRAINES ❤️
- Use the diary as a symptom diary or use the symptom tracker value scale to log symptom severity
- Track & Journal anything: Such as a pain tracker and pain journal for chronic pain or a symptom diary for pain, migraines, headaches, mood or medication

✔️ADD YOUR CARE TEAM TO SHARE REPORTS & INSIGHTS 👨‍⚕️
- Save Caregiver information for future reference
- Add Caregiver pill alerts for missed dosages, have someone help you stay on track of your goals
- Allow Caregivers to view your care plan & reports. Share Symptom reports from your medicine tracker directly with family

✔️ MONITOR PROGRESS with REPORTS, LOGS and CORRELATIONS (TRIGGERS) 📊
- Summarized reports from your check-ins in charts, see what works and what doesn't alongside your goals.
- See total adherence from your med reminders

✔️INTEGRATE With WEARABLES 📲
- Apple Health & Google Fit

✔️Save & Share Health Appointments

✔️Save Health Immunization & Vaccinations Records

✔️COMPLETE HEALTH PLANNER ⛑
- Take a photo of your prescription to enter meds, no typing needed!
- Additional use cases: Mood Tracker, Pain Tracker, Track Urine, PMS, Stool, Food Allergy and GI Symptoms
- Securely Syncs & Backups with Desktop Web App at https://start.careclinic.io/ 
- Restore data on any device
- Track multiple care plans for family members like kids and seniors
- Automatically get calories, micronutrient and macronutrients for food & drinks 🥑 🥦

👍🏽Essential for managing any chronic illness or health symptoms: Chronic Pain, Cancer, Fibromyalgia, IBD & IBS (Bowel Movements), Urine, Diabetes Care, COPD, Epilepsy, Psoriasis, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Fibromyalgia, Multiple sclerosis (MS Symptoms), IPF. Also for mental health: ADHD, Headache Tracker, Depression, Anxiety, PMS & other disorders

$6.99/m or $59.99/yr subscription for more features. More affordable than other medication trackers, Medisafe!

comments: Works well as medication reminder! Using it to track my mood for CBT. I've upgraded to be able to share my treatment with my family and therapist.. Didn't see this functionality in other apps.
It is free to use so I like it <3 I use it to manage my health and wellness… I was looking for the livongo app to track diabetes and set insulin reminders, but this one is good too.
App freezes every time I try to cancel subscription.

To me, the app was not user-friendly. I found myself entering the same information repeatedly and sometimes the data just would not save (specifically in the Goals section). Second, the format provides low visibility. I was looking for something thst displays data like a calendar with icons and notes to show my doctors an overall picture of my health for each day. This is more like a database that has to be searched by individual criteria. I can't use this app in its current format.
Simple and organized; has a user-friendly interface! A very helpful app!

title: My Ketogenic Diet
description:
The My Ketogenic Diet Connected Care App is part of the My Ketogenic Diet Connected Care Platform and allows patients, using a ketogenic diet to manage their epilepsy, to monitor and record food intake, seizures, weight, blood ketone and glucose levels and share this data in real time with their dietetic team.  

You will need to initially talk to your dietitian and ask them to on-board you. You will then receive text and e-mail invites with various registration details, including a link to download the App. 

Your dietitian will set your own personalised macronutrient and ketone targets, allowing you to monitor your dietary food intake and blood ketones carefully against these levels. 

You may also want to talk to your dietitian about setting up ‘flagging’ whereby your dietitian can be remotely informed of things like ketone levels being out-of-bounds; macronutrient intake over or under target levels.
descriptionHTML:
The My Ketogenic Diet Connected Care App is part of the My Ketogenic Diet Connected Care Platform and allows patients, using a ketogenic diet to manage their epilepsy, to monitor and record food intake, seizures, weight, blood ketone and glucose levels and share this data in real time with their dietetic team.

You will need to initially talk to your dietitian and ask them to on-board you. You will then receive text and e-mail invites with various registration details, including a link to download the App.

Your dietitian will set your own personalised macronutrient and ketone targets, allowing you to monitor your dietary food intake and blood ketones carefully against these levels.

You may also want to talk to your dietitian about setting up ‘flagging’ whereby your dietitian can be remotely informed of things like ketone levels being out-of-bounds; macronutrient intake over or under target levels.
summary: A tool for families managing epilepsy with a ketogenic diet.

title: Hue Stream
description:
Brings Hue Sync desktop app experience to Android devices including TV.

Hue Stream application uses entertainment API to stream colours to Hue lights almost instantly. This makes possible to sync screen picture with your lights with shortest possible delay. Application is easy to use. All you need is to discover Hue bridge, select your favourite entertainment group and press Start button. Hue Stream runs as a service in background while you can play Android game or watch movie, youtube...

Doesn't work with external TV video inputs (hdmi...). 
Designed to work only with Android apps.

Please use official Philips Hue app to create entertainment setup. Placement of lights in entertainment setup is used to define part of the screen picture from where colour will be extracted.

Highlights:
- Works only with second generation bridge.
- DRM content is not supported e.g. Netflix...
- People with epilepsy should use carefully.
- Exclude the app from battery optimisation.
- Doesn't support external video inputs like hdmi.

Doesn't work with external TV video inputs (hdmi...).

- Exclude the app from battery optimisation.

summary: Sync colours from Android device screen directly to Philips Hue lights!
recentChanges: Possibility to search bridge by IP address.
comments: Simple to set-up, and works perfectly on my NVIDIA Shield TV Pro with Plex. Seems really responsive with low latency, exactly what I needed, and no need for the Hue Sync box. Would love to see support for the nearly released Hue Gradient Light Strip - as currently it only sets the strip to a single color rather than the 7 individual color zones, which the offical Hue Sync PC App can do.

Oct-25 : Any reason why the black color in screen is shown as white color in the lights? Can that not be considered for a change? Jan-2019 :This app has a lot of potential. I use it with my phone and also on my TV connected to Nvidia Shield Box. Works fine. Thanks for the application.

Works awesome. Have it set up on my shield pro with plex and an lg OLED C9. As far as it not syncing with DRM content such as Netflix, Prime, Disney try running them in your chrome browser (sideload onto your android device like shield pro) and it should work. This is not the fault of the app as hue will not sync to DRM content even with the hue sync box. Make sure to set up your light placement in the hue app entertainment area as doing this gave me complete screen coverage with my 3 lights.

I'm using this with a shield TV, i watch all my content through an app, so movies, live TV, series etc, all work really well. But if you watch through actual Netflix or prime etc, it won't work.. saved me buying a sync box for now
It works with content that's not protected, so Netflix and other streaming apps do not work. Video files, certain apps, and games work. Best movie so far using this has been Godzilla King of Monsters

title: Epilepsie du chien et du chat : Suivi des crises
description:
Cette application est un outil de suivi des crises de son chien ou chat épileptique. 

Grâce au bouton chronomètre, vous pouvez enregistrer simplement la durée d’une crise puis ajouter ensuite tous les détails nécessaires. 

Les crises sont présentées sous forme d’un tableau de bord (calendrier) ou sous forme de graphique. Vous avez accès ainsi en coup d’œil à l’historique des crises. Il peut être imprimé ou envoyé directement à votre vétérinaire. 

Vous pouvez aussi consulter, à tout moment, nos articles et conseils sur l’épilepsie.

title: Sleep Easily Guided Meditation for Relaxation
description:
Sleep Easily Guided Meditation was written and read by Shazzie Love. As an acclaimed author of five books, the creator of several life transformation programmes and an international speaker and workshop facilitator, her quest is always the same: to help you on your journey back to the centre of your own heart. 

Relax into her soothing words and let go fully into a deeply relaxing sleep. During this twenty six minute recording, you’ll be gently guided every step of the way to relax your whole body and mind. You can also set a wake-up alarm through the built-in alarm clock before launching the session.

Throughout this beautiful recording, you’ll be held by the music and sounds created by Ali Calderwood. Ali is an accomplished musician and healer who also produces the exquisite music of Anima. 

Ali’s uniquely crafted music soundscapes within this guided meditation contains specifically designed combinations of healing frequencies which will have a deep, therapeutic effect on you. You will experience state of the art production techniques such as whispering echoed background vocals which pan from left to right across the stereo range.

This unique effect will help you relax deeper into the meditative sleep . You will also hear some 60 BPM digital sound effects as well as powerful subliminal suggestions that compound the therapeutic effect. 

This meditation will leave you refreshed, renewed and resonating so much more from your heart and a place of stillness. From there, you’ll be able to attract towards you everything your heart desires, without your head getting in the way.

Do NOT listen while driving or operating machinery.
If you suffer with serious depression or epilepsy please consult your doctor before listening to this App.


This App Includes:

- Sleep Easily Guided Meditation (Running Time: 26:46)
- Set wake-up time (built-in Alarm Clock)
- How To Use This App
- About Shazzie & Ali eBook
- Diviniti Publishing Home
- Share This App

Developed by Arkenea Technologies (www.arkenea.com) for Diviniti Publishing Ltd.

comments: I have been using the free version of this app. I have found this to be such a positive experience. I'm sleeping better and I fall asleep faster each time I use it. Soon I'll be falling asleep the minute I turn it on! I would purchase additional work by the creator but none seemed a good fit. I think I have what i need for now. Update, its been over a year now and this is still worked into my nightly routine. I find it soothing, pleasant and most importantly restful♥️.

Very relaxing and puts me to sleep nearly every time! Favorite out of all styles (eg nature sounds, lullabies, etc), and I have tried dozens!. If it had a timer to go along with the loop feature, it would get five stars. That being said, it is infrequently that I need to listen more than once since it is amazingly effective. Shazzie truly does understand the flow in which various body parts will relax; and her voice is so calming; but the background music is just a bit low. Huge fan!

Relaxing, even after years of listening. I used to go through so many meditation tracks as I would get sick of hearing the same voice, but I purchased the sleep easy and the love your body meditation, and 6 years on, I'm still loving it (at least 4 nights/week). Shazzi's voice is so comforting and the music is deeply touching.
Shaz's sleep meditation is the complete package. The body scan, affirmations and calming music are a near perfect combination. I'd like a new release or few other meditations for 5 stars.

I have been using this app for almost a year now and ot relaxes me every time even after a hard dau at work or stages of sadness. I suffer with depression and can honestly give it a five star rating. Recomended. Keep up the good work

title: Epilepsia
description:
-La epilepsia es un trastorno neurológico crónico que afecta más de 50 millones de personas de todas las edades.

 -“Epilepsia” es una aplicación que te permite llevar un seguimiento de la duración de cada ataque que es presentado por el paciente, permite visualizar en modo gráfico las duraciones por fecha, intensidad y duración del mismo.

-Botón de pánico para alertar a 3 familiares de algún suceso anormal vía SMS que además incluye la geolocalización del remitente.

-Botón de pánico que realiza una llamada al número de emergencias de elección por los familiares.

-Control de tratamientos con datos completos de los medicamentos suministrados, control de tomas y expediente médico.

-Incluye una sección para llevar exclusivamente una agenda medica dedicada a este padecimiento con opción a realizar llamadas en 2 clics.

title: Migraine Buddy - The Migraine and Headache Tracker
description:
Rated the #1 Migraine and Headache App. Join the 2.3 million users who are taking control of their headaches and migraine.

Migraine Buddy is just the best to: 
- Track and find patterns faster than ever
- Obtain the most from your consultation with reports designed by the best specialists
- Help and be helped, with crowdsourced learnings and optional chats
- [Premium] Predict your risks and anticipate attacks, and find the best reliefs to get back on track faster
- [Premium] Benefit from coaching plans designed by specialists to get results at your speed


What you get with Migraine Buddy


48 Hour Pressure Forecast

How does it help you?
Is pressure variation triggering your attack? You can not change the weather but you can plan ahead. Be aware of upcoming pressure changes and adapt to hopefully avoid the attack.


Automatic Sleep Recording

How does it help you?
Identify a relationship between your sleeping routine and the onset of attacks.


Customizable Attack Recording

How does it help you?
Gives you insights on largely spread triggers, symptoms, medications and relief methods and enables you to add your very own migraine characteristics.


Exports for doctors

- Diary export, the best structured export to go deep in the understanding of your headache and migraines, usually for lower frequency cases, and needed for diagnostics.
- MIR export, the best high export to work on reducing your migraine and headache frequencies with your neurologist and headache specialists.


Migraine Insights & News

An in-app newsfeed with regular posts related to migraine.

How does it help you?
Learn about migraine, know more about the app and be aware of the latest migraine news. Answer questionnaires and learn about the other users.
Where to find it? In the Insight section of your app


An Active Community

A welcoming community with 2.3 million users actively participating in support and share experiences or advice.

How does it help you?
Migraine is an isolating disease. Receiving support from other users who understand is important. Also each person’s experience with migraine is different, share experiences provides new insights to your migraine journey


Need more? Get MBplus, the premium Migraine Buddy.

Supporting your migraine journey with the world's best migraine management tools at your fingertips. With MBplus, you’ll get : 
- Advanced Features
- Advanced Reports
- Actionable Programs

comments: The best way to keep a journal on your attacks and symptoms. I have IIH and chronic migraines and naturally have to attend hospital appointments. This is a really convenient app to log down your attacks and see the duration of each one and how often. It's hard to rely on memory alone or write when having an illness so this is a really quick way for me to record for all my doctor's.

This used to be a 5 Star App, but some of the features are now only available if you pay a subscription. It also keeps sending me reminders about things I don't need. I know my triggers, I don't have scheduled upcoming dr appt cuz I don't have insurance. Please stop suggesting these things

App is awesome and quite useful. Just a couple of cons: when selecting gender on our profile we don't have more than the binomial options and, also, it's be great to be able to customize the avatar at the main page (the one that tells you how much time you've been on or out of attack)
Still crashes, required uninstall then reinstall to get it to work some. However, several times unable to save sleep notes after reinstall. Still broken on my Note 9 samsung phone.
For some reason I am unable to save my sleep tracking when I sleep, but am able to delete it when it tracks and I don't sleep. APP is starting to have issues.

comments: Very relaxing and easy to listen to. Advise buying the app and listening regularly for it to really work. I have 3 of these apps installed and enjoy them all, but this is my favourite. The stop smoking app was the only thing that really managed to help me with smoking.

These apps are perfect. I use a few of them and it actually works, as well as teaching me about myself! I never used to be able to relax into hypnosis or meditation, but the ability to go back and try again with the same app the next day has me a pro! Have recommended to all family friends
The app has a recording that can only be paused and played. Every single feature is made to be unlocked with purchase. It's just not helpful unless you buy it.
I actually felt a boost in self esteem after the first time I highly recommend it because I had a good day that I know was a result of using this app.
Good app, relaxes me a lot, bit not for me. Didn't like too much talk! Ate too much of my expensive UK DATA at 35mb for just 2 uses! Hella NO! Deleted asap! UK REVIEW

title: Medical ID - In Case of Emergency (ICE)
description:
Medical ID allows creating medical profiles that are accessible from the lock screen of your device. In case of emergency, the app enables quick access to vital information such as your allergies, blood type, medical contacts, etc. that are essential to attending first responders, medics or medical staff having to take action. 

The app includes several features:

 • Quick access to medical information from your lock screen.
 • Emergency alert feature to send SMS in one click (with your estimated location).
 • Direct emergency contacts call from the lock screen without having to unlock.
 • Body Mass Index (BMI) calculation.
 • Current location (address, GPS coordinates).
 • Compass.

In emergency situations, a Medical ID could prove to be invaluable to attending medics or other medical personnel providing treatment. Do not wait, turn your Android device into a life-saving tool.

Terms of use:
https://medicalid.app/eula
Privacy policy:
https://medicalid.app/privacy

Note that your medical information remains on your device. Thus, you are responsible for this information and its use. Requested permissions are used for the described features only, not to collect data against your will.

We recommend that you try out the free version before purchasing the premium. Indeed, the app may not work properly on some devices running a customized Android version or making use of apps that "clean up" or kill other apps. The same may apply to devices with specific security settings.

Please contact us by email if you have any questions, or file an issue at:
https://issues.medicalid.app

You can also help to translate or improve the translation of the app. If you are interested, please have a look at:
https://translate.medicalid.app

recentChanges:
• Adds a set of security options to prevent triggering phone or SMS alerts caused by undesired taps on the device screen. You will find the options under "Alerts" in the app settings.
