recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

title: AT&T Call Protect
description:
Activate the Call Protect app to enable Spam Risk and Unknown Caller blocking and more at no extra charge. Eligible AT&T subscribers are already protected with automatic Fraud call blocking and nuisance call warnings, using the power of the AT&T network. Call Protect subscribers also receive access to AT&T Mobile Security which help protect your phone from malware, viruses and other mobile threats. Req’s download of separate apps.  

Avail. for AT&T postpaid, FirstNet and business wireless customers with eligible wireless service.  

AT&T Call Protect: 
- Automatic Fraud Blocking: Detects and blocks calls from likely fraudsters, before your phone even rings 
- Block Spam Risk labelled calls: Enable in-app to block or send to voicemail calls identified as Spam Risk 
- Unknown Callers sent to voicemail: Enable in-app to send callers not in your contact list to voicemail. 
- Get a heads up on potential nuisance calls*: See warnings of telemarketers, nonprofit, surveys, account services, private or political callers 
- Personal Block List: Add individual unwanted callers to your own block list 
- Report Spam Calls: Help identify suspected spam and likely fraud calls. Your reports help us to continually improve our service for everyone  

AT&T Call Protect Plus (In-app purchase): 
- Caller ID*: Gives you caller details 
- Custom Call Controls: Take more control by blocking, sending to voicemail or allowing entire Categories (Telemarketer, Account Services, etc.) of callers 
- Reverse Number Lookup: Shows caller details when you enter a U.S. number. Up to 200 queries per user within 24-hour period. 
*Available in AT&T HD Voice coverage areas  

AT&T Mobile Security & Call Protect Terms: 
Automatic Fraud and Spam Risk Blocking: May inadvertently block wanted calls. Nuisance Call warnings: May include service messages and/or other permitted calls. Personal Block List: Permits blocking of individual phone numbers (excludes private numbers). Manage all settings via app.  

AT&T Mobile Security & Call Protect Plus Terms: 
$3.99/mo. Service auto-renews every 30 days unless canceled. Manage mobile purchases at att.com/mobilepurchases or call 800.331.0500 (611 from wireless phone). All Google Play billed subscriptions must be cancelled within Google Play. Deleting the app will not cancel the subscription. Custom Call Controls: All call categories, except Fraud, are automatically set to allow. Manage all settings via app. Payments are nonrefundable (subj. to applicable law).  

Rates: Data charges may apply for app download and usage. Other charges and restr. may apply. Eligibility: Compatible device req’d and includes AT&T HD Voice-enabled Android smartphones. Smartphones sold by other carriers may not be eligible. Excludes AT&T PREPAID.  

For complete terms for AT&T Call Protect, see att.com/callprotectterms 
For complete terms for AT&T Mobile Security, see att.com/mobilesecurityeula

comments: This app does not work. I called AT&T three times and it still not working. Keep getting the same error message " The system is currenrly unavailable. Check your connection and try again later." The funny part it used to work fine but I noticed in September I was getting a lot of spam calls so I checked the app. If I could I would give it negative stars. Wow just emailed att I get a response telling me to call them terrible customer service from AT&T.

This app was working well but started ignoring my settings to allow my contact list to call thru. ALL incoming calls would go directly to voice mail with no ring or notice. Only way to receive calls was to disable both this app and it's companion security app. Call Protect needs to be a stand alone app not tied to any other apps. When Pre loaded apps mess up, it's a nightmare, can't UNINSTALL completely. All you can do is disable and remove all their updates. SUCKS!!!! NOT HAPPY!!!

I have the new Samsung note ultra, and this app doesn't open. I always get an error message. "Somethings not right", "Not avaliable at this time", "try again later". This error has been going on for awhile, but now not even the old version works. Please fix. I am going to have to download another call protect app if this error message continues.

This app doesn't work. When I run it I get the error message, "Something went wrong. The system is unavailable. Check your connection and try again later." There is nothing wrong with either my connection to the ATT cell network, my wifi, or the Internet. I tried this app multiple times on 2 separate occasions 24 hours apart. This app is what Att Customer Service recommends for addressing the hundreds of political texts soliciting me for money, ATT and the app developers should be ashamed.

I really liked the app, until it stopped working. I get messages of Need more mobile data...if it takes more than 9 Gigs, I don't want it. I really have a problem of paying for something and not getting it. Even with Wifi it won't work. I have tried disabling the app. Did not work for me. I would like to have it..But want it to work.

title: Fruit Ninja 2
description:
Fruit Ninja is one of the most fun games of all time. Come see the next game in the Fruitasia universe!

Ready your blade! Everyone's fun, fruit slicing action game is back with the addition of fun mini games and real-time competitive action!

Enjoy all the action as you challenge other ninjas from around the world. No other games come close to providing as much fun as you work your way up the ranks to become the Fruit Ninja champion. Whether your reflexes are sharp, wisdom is deep, or you just really hate organic food, Fruit Ninja 2 promises to give you fun, engaging games in action packed slices of time. So what are you waiting for? Draw your blade and prepare to slice!

FEATURES:
- The most addictively fun action games on mobile
- Turn up the action when you unleash all new fun powerups
- Collect insanely fun legendary blades to get the edge over your opponents
- Beautiful arenas set the stage for ultimate action packed games
- Join the fun and become a Fruit Ninja champion by slicing your way up through the leagues
- Master combos, criticals, and blitzing to win more games than your friends and family
- Experience the fun and action of a whole new range of Fruit Ninja mini games
- Show off your inner ninja as you unlock fun new characters and taunt packs

Privacy policy: http://halfbrick.com/pp
Terms of service: http://halfbrick.com/tos

title: John Libbey journals
description:
The newsstand brings together in a single application all the journals published by John Libbey Eurotext.
Subscribers can access their content by simply connecting with their John Libbey IDs (the IDs are identical for www.jle.com and the newsstand)
Discovery access is also possible on simple registration in order to access the articles in free access. 
Our readers can build their own reading journey by managing their favourite library and articles, which remain accessible offline, and enjoy their journal any time.

Discover all John Libbey journals:
-	Annales de Biologie Clinique
-	Bulletin infirmier du cancer
-	Dermato Mag
-	Environnement, risques et santé
-	Epileptic Disorders
-	European Cytokine Network
-	European Journal of Dermatology
-	Gériatrie et psychologie neuropsychiatrie du vieillissement
-	Hématologie
-	Hépato-gastro et Oncologie digestive
-	Innovations et thérapeutiques en oncologie
-	Journal de Pharmacie Clinique
-	L’information psychiatrique
-	Magnesium Research
-	Médecine
-	Médecine de la reproduction
-	Médecine et Santé Tropicales
-	Médecine Thérapeutique
-	Médecine Thérapeutique / Pédiatrie
-	Revue de neuropsychologie
-	Sang Thrombose Vaisseaux
-	Sciences Sociales et santé
-	Virologie

title: Anxiety Relief Hypnosis - Stress, Panic Attacks
description:
If you’re seeking stress relief or anti anxiety help, you are not alone. Anxiety and depression affect millions and can make everyday life unbearable. But if you suffer from an anxiety disorder, don’t get frustrated using an anxiety tracker and seeing no improvement. Before giving up, try tapping into the power of hypnotherapy with a guided anxiety meditation written and read by a certified hypnotherapist. This anxiety help app is designed to show you how to reduce anxiety and to learn anxiety management techniques. When your anxiety is reduced, you may also notice an improvement in related symptoms like anger management, OCD, PTSD, or even panic attack relief. You have the power to relieve stress, anxiety and depression — see if hypnosis is right for you to unlock your own ability to live your life outside of the shadow of depression and anxiety!*

◎ A single audio session of 30 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1–3 weeks
◎ Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
◎ Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
◎ Hypnotic Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for receiving hypnotic suggestions
◎ Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Hypnotic Booster
◎ Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep
◎ Repeat sessions or loop while you sleep
◎ Continue listening to background sounds after the session ends

Anxiety Relief Hypnosis is free to try and effective* with the default settings. A one-time in-app purchase is required only if you wish to change the default settings. (Each of our free hypnosis apps includes its own in-app purchase; in-app purchases cannot be shared among separate apps.)

INTERACT WITH US

Surf City Apps offers a range of hypnosis apps to help you enjoy a healthier, happier, and more abundant life. Tell us how you use our apps to improve your life:

Facebook.com/surfcityapps
Twitter.com/SurfCityApps
http://surfcityapps.com

CONTACT SUPPORT

http://support.surfcityapps.com

TERMS & CONDITIONS

http://surfcityapps.com/terms

REFERENCES

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypnosis

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binaural_beats

*DISCLAIMER

Results not clinically proven. The content and services provided by this Application are for educational purposes only and are not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never rely on information on this Application in place of seeking professional medical advice. Consult your doctor before using this Application if you suffer from a heart condition, mood disorder, epilepsy, or a psychiatric or neurological condition.

comments: I love it! It really works for me. I was always so tense and full of anxiety, but this started to work right away. If you don't crank the sound up it works better. I don't know who's voice that is but it's so soothing and makes me unwind instantly! Don't change a thing! Thank you to the creators of this app. It's been a God send for my healing from anxiety.

I've been on a severe anxiety attack that went on for 3 days. I was considering hypnosis through a consultant but stumbled upon this app. I paid the extra $$ to move the hypno sound all the way up and to put it on loop so it can play while I'm asleep. After the 1st night of listening my anxiety attack was 70% gone. 2nd night no anxiety. I've downloaded a couple of other hypnosis apps, self esteem, fear and exercise. *UPDATE* It'd be great if I could play all of the apps i unlocked while I sleep

Free yet not free. Although it said the app was free, once you try it, you discover many features are not available until you upgrade to a paid version, never mentioned on the download page. It was impossible to evaluate with so many features unusable.

This had become 1 of my go-to apps at the end of the day. If you don't over expect any sudden results. I just allow it to give me at least 30 min of mindfulness. When used at night I do find I sleep better.
Thankful that it doesn't ask for personal details (name, age, address etc) great job 👍 wish more apps were like this. Straight to the point

title: Journal of Epilepsy Research
description:
of the Korean Epilepsy society and is published every six month. This journal publishes research articles in epilepsy and epilepsy-related fields including clinical and basic researches.

The Epilepsy publishes Reviews, Original Articles, Case Reports, and Editorials, and articles commissioned by the Editorial Committee. For Reviews, the authors must obtain permission from the Editorial Committee before submitting the manuscript. Case reports are considered for publication only when they are unique and illustrative. All manuscripts are subject to peer review.z

comments: I purchased a year subscription a couple months ago. It was great now in this last week it has so many glitches and each item doesn't want to open takes forever! And now they keep telling me I need to buy the upgraded version if I want to use something. I already did like I said I turned into the Developers, nothing has changed so far. I should have stuck with the free! You get one star because I had to give it to you!

Use to really like this app but now it's just slow so slow I had to wait five minutes for it to switch to another item. Use can use everything then when you finally get it the way you want and go to save it says it's premium and deletes your looks. Maybe you can be nicer to us who can't pay for premium and tell us what is premium instead of having us guess.

I've used this app for quite a very long time now, and not until recently (yesterday to be precise) did I notice that an update I choose to call *super*, is available. The old one was awesome, but this new one (updated one), is super awesome. Kudos to youcam makeup team, I love every part of this app. Please keep up the good work.👍👍👍👍👍

I really like this app it lets you try different eye shadows and hair colors plus fix whatever flaw you may feel you have about your face. Lots of preset makeup looks to select from. What do you have to lose for goodness sake, download and make yourself beautiful or just find what colors or different styles look good on you.

I love this app very much it has so many make up things to do so,i would like to tell every body to install this app it takes pictures also very nice my favourite camera is YouCam Makeup . I always use this app to take pictures my mother also love this app very much it dosen't have any side-effects also but when we go to look it need wifi or data to work so this app is so much fun every type of colours lipsitck,eyeliner , eyeshadho , founddation ......etc so from my side. Five 5 stars.to it.

title: Clue: Period Tracker, Ovulation, Cycle & Pregnancy
description:
Clue is more than a period tracker – it’s an accurate menstrual calendar, ovulation app, and pregnancy tracker that helps you take control of your reproductive health. It’s a scientific and fluff-free way to learn about your body and discover unique patterns in your menstrual cycle.  

With the Clue app, your periods, symptoms, fertility and pregnancy are all in one place. Great skin when you ovulate? Headaches during PMS? Learn about your personal patterns with 30+ tracking options from birth control pills to cramps, emotions, skin, moods, cervical fluid, and more. Plus, set reminders so you never get surprised by a period again. Clue is the period calendar, fertility tracker and pregnancy app that adapts to you and your unique cycle: the more you track, the more you learn, and the more you start to live in sync with your biology. 

** Top free period tracker app – Obstetrics & Gynecology Journal (ACOG) **
** Best Fertility Apps 2020 – Healthline **

CLUE PERIOD & OVULATION TRACKER TOP FEATURES:
· Period tracker, period calendar, ovulation tracker, and fertility tracker
· Accurate period predictions for upcoming cycles
· Log your symptoms, flow, moods and more and find patterns in your cycle
· Ovulation app to track ovulation tests and your BBT 
· Calendar reminders for upcoming periods, ovulation and PMS
· Predictions for your recurring symptoms, like cramps, pain, and headaches
· A period calendar with your menstruation, ovulation and fertile days
· Log and set birth control pill reminders
· A cycle analysis of your period lengths to observe trends and irregular cycles
· Menstrual health tips curated for you that explain your symptoms 

PERIOD TRACKER & MENSTRUAL CALENDAR 
· Period predictions, fertile day and ovulation estimates 
· A period diary to log your period days, flow intensity and the menstrual products you use
· Track symptoms, cravings, pain, exercise, and more to find patterns in your cycle
· Set up calendar reminders before your next period, ovulation, fertile window and PMS 

OVULATION TRACKER & FERTILITY TRACKER: 
· Ovulation calculator and basal body temperature tracker
· Fertility predictions and fertility friend to help you get pregnant if you’re trying to conceive
· Log ovulation test and cervical fluid for improved ovulation estimations
· Set fertility and ovulation calendar reminders to help plan a pregnancy

*NEW* PREGNANCY TRACKER & WEEK BY WEEK GUIDE
· Log into pregnancy mode to set your expected due date with a pregnancy calculator
· A pregnancy calendar and baby growth tracker to keep track of your trimester 
· Track pregnancy symptoms, baby movement, and more 
· Fact-checked health content to guide you through your pregnancy week by week so you know what to expect

FIND UNIQUE PATTERNS IN YOUR MENSTRUAL CYCLE
· View your period lengths and cycle variations
· See the symptoms you tracked in relation to your menstrual cycle
· Use Clue to help you manage your PCOS and irregular cycles
· Started menstruating? Clue is a helpful period tracker for teens
· Bring the Clue Period Tracker app to your OBGYN and have your period history available

Clue is a cycle tracker built for anyone who menstruates and uses gender-neutral language.

Note: Clue Period Tracker & Ovulation app should not be used as a contraceptive.

Helloclue.com – Menstrual cycle encyclopedia and resource for  period, fertility, birth control, sex, and LGBTQIA topics. 

twitter.com/clue
facebook.com/helloclue
instagram.com/clueapp
tiktok.com/@clueapp
helloclue.com/hormonal

If you run into any trouble, the support team is here to help! Tap:
1. "More" menu 
2. Support
3. Choose the topic of your inquiry
Or, submit a request directly through this form: support.helloclue.com

recentChanges:
Welcome to the world, pregnancy mode! Our most requested feature is finally here! Now, you can switch from period to pregnancy tracking by upgrading to Clue Plus.
- Log your pregnancy and set your due date in a new pregnancy calendar

comments: I've been using Clue for a solid 5 years now, and I really like the app. I've only had issues with the new update. The app has been throwing me out sometimes when I press the "back" button. Also, whenever I try to reorder my tracking options to my taste, it doesn't register them and shifts them back to the original, unwanted order. I also don't like that the "track today's data" button on the centre of the cycle got removed. It was super convenient and I'd want it back. Otherwise love the app.

Please help! This app is amazing but it's starting to be weird!- Basically, it keeps tracking stuff on its own and it changes everything. It completely destroyed everything in my cycle! It made the period length from 5 days (which I am) to 1.5 days! And it keeps tracking to heavy bleeding etc when I'm not bleeding at all! I love this app so much and I really need it to work. Why does it do this? What can I do about it? Did someone possibly "hack" me without knowing and starting tracking?

Easy to use and unobtrusive experience. I haven't gotten enough cycles yet for symptom predictions, but just the act of tracking them has gotten me in better touch with what's going on. The app has useful information as well. I am not subscribed and just using the free version. I'll think about subscribing when I see how the experience is with predictions.

Edit: yes! The lock is 'fixed'! I now need to punch in my pin everytime I navigate to a different screen in the app instead of just once! Great work guys! /sarcasm. This app has gotten really pushy with trying to get you to pay to the point I want to uninstall. To top it off , the password lock is no longer functioning even though it's on in my settings.

Idk what they did to the app because after an update around september, it startes crashing when i tried to use certain features. I knew it wasnt my phone because many people complained about the same issue around the same time and I was hoping they'd fix it. Instead, the problem got progressively worse to the point where i get error messages telling me the app isn't working or that it needs to close when it's already supposedly closed. Years lost cause now I can't even get my data back. Trash.

summary: Free Hypnosis/Hypnotherapy and Self Development Audios by Joseph Clough.
comments: Love this app. I started using Joseph's hypnosis app fine years ago with the onset of severe panic attacks that were disabling my life and ability to function. After a few times I achieved a magical trance and could see improvement in my life. I also use therapy and mindfulness to manage my mental health along with the app. Years later I still use and recommend to everyone.

I love the hypnosis tracks, but they don't play correctly. I can't play them through my audible account and the Google music freaks out whenever I try to turn off my screen. I didn't have this problem until about a year ago and it really makes this hard to use.
Tried the 2 of the free audios which are very good. But none of the audio from the Free Tab will download, keeps saying not enough free space, check sd card.
I've been using it for years! I recommend to all my friends who are dealing with stress along with all my high school students especially now dealing with the covid 19 pandemic.

I was very impressed with the free trial sessions so I bought some of the longer sessions. Yesterday the app started crashing repeatedly and I have been unable to listen to purchased sessions. Very frustrating...... However, having contacted Joseph Clough by e-mail I received a response very quickly with a suggested fix.

title: Helix Crush
description:
Helix Crush combines one-finger control gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience you have ever been through before. Featuring different stage of increasing difficulty to unlock new skins and popular songs. The key is to not let your color ball drops on obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and afterward you will find yourself singing and loving this music game.

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Game rules:
Swipe the screen to jump ball and fall through helix tower, cut them colorful fruit and cake slices on the road you drop and listen to the music! Keep calm and go as far as possible in this ball game!

Game features:
1. Original background music
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty
3. Very simple gameplay with only one finger swipe
4. Numerous popular song, colorful ball and skin

How to be a Helix master:
1. Dropping the ball to the deepest as you can through helix lighting tower
2. Listening to your beats, utilizing your incredible reflexes, bounce your ball from different fruit and cake slides
3. Following the flow of your music and you never miss any jump to drop your ball!
4. Make as much crazy bouncy, drop faster as you can
5. Challenge your friends to see who’s the Helix Master

Free songs and amazing gifts are waiting for you to take.

Support:
Are you having problems? Send email to support@amanotes.com

About us::
Helix Crush is the official game of Amanotes, a fast-growing app publisher from Vietnam with global reach. With more than 10.000.000+ download all over the world, all players around the globe can enjoy this jumping ball with the same thrill of the competition and sharing the enjoyable moment with each other.

title: Enjoy Exercise Hypnosis - Workout Motivation
description:
◎ A single audio session of 25 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1–3 weeks
◎ Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
◎ Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
◎ Hypnotic Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for receiving hypnotic suggestions
◎ Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Hypnotic Booster
◎ Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep
◎ Repeat sessions or loop while you sleep
◎ Continue listening to background sounds after the session ends

THE BEST EXERCISE HYPNOSIS APP AVAILABLE

Enjoy Exercise Hypnosis is free to try and effective* with the default settings. A one-time in-app purchase is required only if you wish to change the default settings. (Each of our free hypnosis apps includes its own in-app purchase; in-app purchases cannot be shared among separate apps.)

INTERACT WITH US

Surf City Apps offers a range of hypnosis apps to help you enjoy a healthier, happier, and more abundant life. Tell us how you use our apps to improve your life:

Facebook.com/surfcityapps

CONTACT SUPPORT

http://support.surfcityapps.com

TERMS & CONDITIONS

http://surfcityapps.com/terms

REFERENCES

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypnosis

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binaural_beats

*DISCLAIMER

Results not clinically proven. The content and services provided by this Application are for educational purposes only and are not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never rely on information on this Application in place of seeking professional medical advice. Consult your doctor before using this Application if you suffer from a heart condition, mood disorder, epilepsy, or a psychiatric or neurological condition.

comments: Good motivation app, bit Laggy. Not for me. Ate too much of my expensive UK DATA at 5mb for 2 uses! Hella NO! Deleted asap! UK REVIEW

Buyer beware: 5/15/20. Still no fix for the app that stopped working and no refund. Paid for the hypnosis 'Exercise app and have been unable to access it for the past year- I'm basically ignored when I ask for assistance in th his matter. Will contact Attorney General if necessary.

I have used many different hypnotherapy apps for years now & this app is right up there with the best of them. It is a little bit generic but covers many bases. I would love an app that is a little more specific for combat sports, strength & Conditioning & for sports related focused, controlled aggression as I have not seen anything like it anywhere.

I think it's sneaky to put no price on your apps and then have incredibly reduced functionality. There is no option to skip the initial promo, no option to switch to sleep and no option to use the "hypnosis booster ". Other apps by Andrew Johnson or Glenn Harrold have either free versions or paid ones with no sneakiness.

It helps me get to sleep when I am too stressed. Gives me motivation to tackle my objectives the next day. I am more productive the following day after I use this app to get to sleep.if I go more than three nights without using the app to fall asleep to, I become lethargic.

title: Neurology Pocketbook
description:
NEUROLOGY AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
"ORIGINAL"
*Find a concise yet comprehensive compilation of Neurology topics on the go!
*Written in a way that can help you easily understand, study, and remember Neurology material.
*Will help you answer the most common “pimping” questions encountered on rounds.
*Have the Neurology physical exam readily available and significance of abnormal findings.
*Find the Neurology exam available in Spanish with pronunciation tips, antiepileptic drugs, visual field deficits diagram, how to do a Lumbar puncture, note templates for wards and NeuroICU, and much more!!
*Must have for medical students, students in medical professions, interns, residents, young doctors, nurse practitioners, physician assistants, and medical providers!

Currently used as a printed booklet for medical students at UTHSCSA to provide what I would have wanted to have at my fingertips when writing a progress note, formulating a differential diagnosis, presenting on rounds, or when having down time to study. It was proven to increase NBME shelf scores!

This booklet was presented at American Academy of Neurology Annual Conference, 2017 in Boston, MA:  Neurology Pocketbook, Neurology at Your Fingertips, for Medical Students

Includes:

- Quick Normal Neurology Exam Template
- Glascow Coma Scale Table
- Neurology Exam
- Special Neuro Exams
- Visual Field Deficits
- Myotomes
- Neurology Exam for the Unconscious Patient
- Memory palace with Cranial Nerves
- Neurology Exam in Spanish
- Neuroimaging
- HPI rounding template
- SOAP template
- NeuroICU template
- Neuro Critical Care
- Neuro ICU pearls
- ICU medications
- Vascular Neurology
- TPA Screening checklist
- Headache
- Localize the Lesion: The Big Picture
- Localize the Lesion: Vascular Territories
- Spinal Cord Syndromes
- LMN Cranial Nerve Palsies
- Peripheral Nerve Disorders
- Peripheral Nerve Syndromes
- Neuromuscular Junction Diseases
- Myopathies
- Demyelinating Diseases of the CNS
- Epilepsy
- Meningitis, Encephalitis, and Brain Abscesses
- Movement Disorders
- Neuro Oncology
- Neuro Cognitive Disease
- Neurology of Systemic Diseases
- Neurology Emergencies
- Lumbar Puncture
- CSF Results
- EMG/NCS
- IVIG/Plasmapheresis/Botox
- Antiepileptic Drugs
- Neuropharm

*Ability to search and bookmark for quick reference.

Written by a Neurology Resident at UT Health San Antonio!
I hope you enjoy and find it helpful!

Paola Montserrat Mendez Gomez, MD

title: TOM: Pill Reminder and Tablet & Medication Tracker
description:
TOM is an ad-free medication reminder and medicine tracker which helps you take your tablets, pills and other medicine when it is time. It features a medication countdown, a virtual medicine cabinet and a pill alarm.

With the new TOM tablet reminder and pill tracker you can enter a new medication in your virtual medicine cabinet within a few seconds. Your digital helper TOM will do the rest for you. Simple, free of charge, ad-free and can be used without registration!

Extremely user-friendly, free of charge and absolutely anonymous: the integrated pill reminder and medication tracker reminds you to take all your pills and tablets in good time, thereby simplifying your everyday life

Developed by affected people for affected people
The free TOM medicine reminder and tablet tracker with an integrated pill reminder is so practical and user-friendly because its developers know from their own experience what requirements a digital tablet reminder has to meet. The ad-free TOM pill tracker and medication reminder is therefore ideally suited for simple, efficient medicine management for a wide variety of diseases, such as diabetes, high blood pressure, asthma, Crohn's disease, stroke, epilepsy, cardiovascular diseases, multiple sclerosis or any other diseases.

The most important functions at a glance
• Extremely easy to use thanks to the dialogue function: TOM asks, you answer - without having to enter any forms or tedious searches in the menu
• Easy and quick acquisition of new medicine
• Management of all kinds of therapies: medications taken day, at intervals of several days or hours, or only once
• Suitable for the treatment of various ailments and diseases (cardiovascular, diabetes, high blood pressure, multiple sclerosis, stroke, asthma, etc.)
• Modern medication countdown for taking your tablets and pills when it is time
• Pill alarm for overdue medication
• Virtual medicine cabinet for a complete overview of your medication
• Maximum data security thanks to anonymous use of the TOM app and bidirectional encryption

Practical and easy to use
The user interface of the TOM medication tracker and medicine reminder is reduced to the essentials, making it incredibly easy to use. The free app communicates with you in simple dialogs - no need to enter complicated details. Thanks to the integrated pill reminder including a countdown, you can also directly see how much time remains until the next medication is immediately visible. Once the countdown is over, a pill alarm reminds you that it is time to take your medicine.

Privacy and data protection have top priority
The use of the TOM tablet reminder and pill tracker is completely anonymous: No registration with personal data such as email, name, address or telephone is necessary. Your entries are only linked to a randomly generated ID number. Even TOM cannot access this number because it is also cryptographically protected. All communication of the TOM app is also encrypted bidirectionally.

Download the TOM medication reminder and medicine tracker now free of charge, give yourself more freedom in everyday life thanks to simple medication management and never forget to take your tablets again thanks to the integrated medicine reminder and tablet tracker for all kinds of pills, tablets and other medicine when it is pill time again. Suitable for various diseases, such as high blood pressure, asthma, stroke, diabetes, etc.

HELP MAKE TOM BETTER WITH YOUR FEEDBACK
Thank you for using the TOM medication tracker and medicine reminder. Your feedback helps us to further develop the TOM medication reminder and pill tracker with the greatest benefit for you. We are therefore always happy to receive your comments, ideas and suggestions at support@innovation6.ch.

title: Fruit Clinic
description:
Fruits need your help!

Prepare your tools and heal the fruits.
Be careful, as an official fruit operator take your job seriously and let the fruits leave your clinic happy.
The more fruits and vegetables you help the more you will earn.

Use your money to rank up your clinic and become the best fruit clinic in the planet.

Have fun and keep operating!

summary: Become the master Fruit Surgeon!
developerAddress:
1100 Page Mill Road
Palo Alto, CA 94304
recentChanges: +Bug Fixes
comments: The game is bugged. I've been stuck on the same level without being to progress for several weeks. Ads are terrible. They're between every round and then some. I paid to remove them because the game is entertaining enough to want to be able to play but not 45 minutes after I paid to remove ads I haven't been able to play the game anymore. The ad I saw and downloaded it from showed the game being more complex than it actually is. It's just repetitive of the exact same things.

Ad before a level. Ad during a level. Ad after a level. Ad to get tools. Then after you get the too, yep you guessed it, ANOTHER AD!! The ads are nearly twice the length that the levels are! This isn't a game but a place for adverts. If you want people to actually enjoy this game then perhaps have an ad after every two to three levels. Ads ads ads. This game is not enjoyable! Uninstalling!!

I don't get ticked off by ads, the game is great but I have two requests. One: More decor, furniture, and the other one. One stopped at 20 , the other 21 and I haven't finished the other one. Another thing: Level 43. When I started, I cut open the aubergine and saw nothing. It's still screaming, there's no tweezers, and when you touch it, it zooms in. Please fix this!

There are way too many adverts for this game to even be playable. I think I got four levels in and on all four levels there was an advert before, during and after the level, then to get new tools, guess what? Another advert. Then to get decor for your office? Another advert. I get in, free games have adverts, but I should spend more time watching them than playing the game. And I only got to level 4 because I kept telling myself not every level will be like this. EVERY LEVEL IS LIKE THIS.

I got up to level 46 but I cannot go further for a bug won't let me get into my next tool. However there are many bugs that are good as well. Turning your internet off will not only get rid of all ads, you can still press "watch ad to claim" on all tools and bonus prizes and not have to watch an ad to get your reward. You will instantly get it. However you need to restart the games a few times after restarting your game in order for this to work.

title: Neurostrobe--brainwave entrainment
description:
Neurostrobe is an app for experimenting with audio-visual brainwave entrainment using your phone's camera flash, vibration motor, and sound. It uses Android's new flashlight APIs to accurately generate high frequencies.

For best results, we recommend using the camera flash and sound mode and  reflecting the flash off a large surface, like a wall.

Audio/visual entrainment is similar to, but more effective than, binaural beats. It uses pulses of sound and light to drive brain activity at a target rhythm.

WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES

A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights.  If you, or anyone in your family has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before using. 

IMMEDIATELY DISCONTINUE use and consult your physician if you experience dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, seizures, or any involuntary movement while using.

Neurostrobe is an app for experimenting with audio-visual brainwave entrainment using your phone's camera flash, vibration motor, and sound. It uses Android's new flashlight APIs to accurately generate high frequencies.

For best results, we recommend using the camera flash and sound mode and reflecting the flash off a large surface, like a wall.

Audio/visual entrainment is similar to, but more effective than, binaural beats. It uses pulses of sound and light to drive brain activity at a target rhythm.

WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES

A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. If you, or anyone in your family has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before using.

IMMEDIATELY DISCONTINUE use and consult your physician if you experience dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, seizures, or any involuntary movement while using.
summary: The most accurate brainwave entrainment using your camera flash
recentChanges:
Supports sound stimulation! This enables you to use the latest version of the GENUS protocol, an experimental method for reducing amyloid in the brain. https://www.alzforum.org/news/research-news/flash-beep-gamma-waves-stimulate-microglia-memory)

Automatic performance optimization and warning when the frequency achieved differs from the set frequency by more than 25%

Various bug fixes
comments: reqires running in the background. noooooope nope nope nope nope. edit: isn't the permission required? that's the fault. the issue isn't a setting of that kind, but being asked to trust. nope. no trust!
Simple interface. Would like a more fine tuned option for like 5.9hz etc.
Camera flash only. Not useful due to lacking every other feature you would need.
Best :)

comments: Used to be good. But the non stop ads with annoying loud noise everytime you open an image is unbelievably a waste of time. Its non stop and continuous. Uninstalled. Edited: Thanks, at least the auto noise is disabled but now, every time you try to edit, there's a pop up ad, even if you are still editing the same picture. That's just too inconvenient and waste of time. Too bad. Found new app that at least lets user "use" their app without interfering.

I loved this app so much that I paid for a yearly subscription only to be told that after three months I needed to repurchase. I followed the instructions and tried to contact the developer with no response. Stupidly I purchased again for the 2 year subscription ( stupid I know) only to have the exact same problem. I tried to problem solve again with no resolution to this problem. Tried to contact someone with no response. I am out nearly $40 and very frustrated. Won't make this mistake again

Money grabber, of course. Allows you to use premium features that it doesn't label as such and THEN hits you up to start a free trial. $25 a year is not horrible, but I like the apps that give you a GOOD free version. And this one doesn't seem to have a good free version. I haven't decided if I want to support this app or not. I'll keep looking for sure. It also makes you sign up immediately with no guest option that I saw.

I like this app , it's amazing and easy to use. It's very creative, adjustable, let.you choose from alot of different veiws how you can design your photo. I just really like it , I'm glad I finally found an app for my photo's I'm always looking for photo apps. I really.enjoyed working with it.

So much design,options, color choices, and fantastic frames. This app definitely keeps me up all night! And, you don't need to be an artist or color professional. Designs and makeup applications you choose and can be proud of. The shades and lighting blend so easily. And with a plethora of filters and effects you are sure to be pleased and proud everytime. And list option gives you the recipe for your looks and makeup Choices. From brands to shadow patterns, and brow shapes you chose.

title: Likee - Let You Shine
description:
Likee is a free original short video making and sharing platform worldwide. Likee brings short videos, video effects and live stream into one easy-to-use application. With the powerful personalized feed and video effects, you can easily find viral videos, capture flawless videos, watch and go live stream. It’s time to express yourself, show your talents, explore and connect with the content you love on Likee.

We have over 100 million users all around the world. More and more people choose Likee for fun, self-expression and friends making. Download and join Likee to discover a bigger world!

Why Likee?

A Popular Special Effects Short Video Maker and Editor
Various video effects, face filters and editing tools on Likee to help you make cool videos with little efforts. 

- SuperMix: enhance videos with cool special effects like Face Morph, Astral Travel, Face Cut and MV and more! A photo is all you need to make professional and fantastic videos.  
- FaceMagic: Swap face with celebrities or movie roles with face recognition technology. Super fun and rich video templates including classic movies, stage show, talk show, funny clips are available!
- Stickers & Music Magic: Customize your videos with various funny stickers, greetings, quotes, colorful hairs and cute emoji. 
- Beauty Camera &Video Filter: Change video backgrounds with video filters. Unlock bunch of video effects like sketch, glitch, vintage, montage and much more! Try different makeups styles in seconds with beauty camera!

A Global Live Stream and Friends Making Community
Millions of talented bloggers, vloggers and video creators like you have already joined Likee! Follow the creators you like, let's chat and make friends.

• Go Live, Receive Gifts and Gain Fans
Go Live on Likee to express yourself to the world. Live stream your life and engage with your audience. Show your talents, boost your fan base and receive gifts. You might just be Likee's next Internet Sensation!

• Watch Live Stream Anytime and Anywhere
Discover countless talented hosts from around the world. Watch Live stream, chat with hosts, and support your favorite hosts by sending gifts. Special features such as LIVE PK, fan club and tournament of Likee Live await you! 


Viral Videos and Creative Contents all around the World
Choose from a great variety of videos, including music, dance, makeup, drawing, DIY, news, movies and everything in between! Powered by the personalized feed based on what you watch, like and share, Likee will offer more of those you like and less of those you don’t. 
On Likee, you can quickly grow your knowledge, get life hacks, laugh with other Likers and keep up with the trend!

All Likers are real, creative and full of passion just like you. Now Join Likee community and explore more than you like.
descriptionHTML:
Likee is a free original short video making and sharing platform worldwide. Likee brings short videos, video effects and live stream into one easy-to-use application. With the powerful personalized feed and video effects, you can easily find viral videos, capture flawless videos, watch and go live stream. It’s time to express yourself, show your talents, explore and connect with the content you love on Likee.

We have over 100 million users all around the world. More and more people choose Likee for fun, self-expression and friends making. Download and join Likee to discover a bigger world!

Why Likee?

A Popular Special Effects Short Video Maker and Editor
Various video effects, face filters and editing tools on Likee to help you make cool videos with little efforts.

- SuperMix: enhance videos with cool special effects like Face Morph, Astral Travel, Face Cut and MV and more! A photo is all you need to make professional and fantastic videos.
- FaceMagic: Swap face with celebrities or movie roles with face recognition technology. Super fun and rich video templates including classic movies, stage show, talk show, funny clips are available!
- Stickers & Music Magic: Customize your videos with various funny stickers, greetings, quotes, colorful hairs and cute emoji.
- Beauty Camera &Video Filter: Change video backgrounds with video filters. Unlock bunch of video effects like sketch, glitch, vintage, montage and much more! Try different makeups styles in seconds with beauty camera!

A Global Live Stream and Friends Making Community
Millions of talented bloggers, vloggers and video creators like you have already joined Likee! Follow the creators you like, let's chat and make friends.

• Go Live, Receive Gifts and Gain Fans
Go Live on Likee to express yourself to the world. Live stream your life and engage with your audience. Show your talents, boost your fan base and receive gifts. You might just be Likee's next Internet Sensation!

• Watch Live Stream Anytime and Anywhere
Discover countless talented hosts from around the world. Watch Live stream, chat with hosts, and support your favorite hosts by sending gifts. Special features such as LIVE PK, fan club and tournament of Likee Live await you!


Viral Videos and Creative Contents all around the World
Choose from a great variety of videos, including music, dance, makeup, drawing, DIY, news, movies and everything in between! Powered by the personalized feed based on what you watch, like and share, Likee will offer more of those you like and less of those you don’t.
On Likee, you can quickly grow your knowledge, get life hacks, laugh with other Likers and keep up with the trend!

All Likers are real, creative and full of passion just like you. Now Join Likee community and explore more than you like.
summary: Global short video creation platform. Special effects, trending videos&community

Not very good, this is one of the weirdest apps, they use the in-built music player in the quick settings in android 11 to get to you, and they say "hey did you want to join my live" like it's a DM but infact it's a pain the ass or "missed calls" is another one, they will fake a miss call to get you to watch someone's live video Please sort out your act likee

★ Grind trains with your cool crew!

comments: I've redownload this game on different phones over the years and do really enjoy the game. But one issue seems consistent despite the device. Maybe it's because I have little fingers but the movements aren't always accurate and it gets really frustrating when you get to higher speeds. I try to slide over and end up jumping instead. Or flat out don't move at all and go splat into the train I was trying to avoid in the first place. It's fun and a good game but the tolerances need to be better.

I haven't played this game for a very long time, but after reinstalling it again recently, all I can say is... Good job on this masterpiece! Seriously, this game is better than I remember! The only reason I vote it for 4 stars is because there are ads popping up on the home screen. Other than that, keep up the good work! 🙌🏼

Amazing game, one of the "originals"- I remember when everyone I knew had this game- and it's continued to develop amazingly! One idea though, would be an option to change the theme, as I, personally, prefer to other themes than the current (Halloween) one. This would be a really nice thing to see added, but still a great game either way! Thank you!

I understand why ads are necessary but what I hate about is the "UnityAds" are always crashing my game and it automatically closing the game. "Google Ads" are better, it does not crash my game. Still 3 stars for now. Hope you removed all the "Unity Ads" in the app. It spoils my experiences in the game. Reported this issue already to your support team. Still waiting for a response. Please? Thank you.

I liked this game very much...✌🏻It's amazing😍👍🏻It's features are also too good 👍🏻✌🏻But one ☝thing I doesn't like is that, that when I am playing my 🎮game the, "Unity Ads" Crash/stop 🙅my 🎮game... The other ads like goggle ads are good then unity ads... because they doesn't stop/crash my 🎮game... I hope that you will remove unity ads.. Plz reply about this.... Thank You for reading my post...

title: Bottle Flip 3D
description:
You have to flip a plastic bottle in the exciting arcade game Bottle Flip 3D! Make the bottle jump or even double flip. How? Just tap the screen at the right moment and jump!

Explore different rooms, jump on all sorts of objects: shelves, tables, chairs, sofas, and even subwoofers! Train your agility, develop coordination, control the strength and distance of the jump. And most importantly - calculate the distance correctly because it depends on whether you can get to the finish line and win! 

Interesting levels, different obstacles, and your ideal flips - with  Bottle Flip 3D you will never be bored! Enjoy!

Functions:
 - Agility, coordination, and fun - this is a new arcade game  Bottle Flip 3D!
 - Flip a plastic bottle - explore different rooms-levels.
 - Tap the screen at the right moment and jump, winning the  Bottle Flip 3D depends on you!
 - Do you think throwing a bottle is easy? Try it then!
 - The fun is just beginning - interesting levels and easy controls, what could be better?

Subscription Terms

VIP Access offers a weekly subscription for $5.99 after a 3 day free trial. Upon purchase of this subscription, you will immediately receive: 3 rare bottles, 200% gems earned, exclusive VIP game mode and remove all ads. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your Google Play account after purchase confirmation. Your subscription is renewed unless you turn it off at least 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will be charged for renewal as well.

The prices are set for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency.

See below links for more information.

For our privacy policy visit: http://tastypill.com/privacypolicy
For our terms of service visit: http://tastypill.com/tos

For any additional question, please contact us at: help@tastypill.com

comments: Honestly, you can't do much without paying £3+. Even small, petty things like leave the music playing after the spoken meditation/hypnosis has finished. Or even more petty, turn off the 'wake up' sound at the end. You have to pay if you want to turn that off. All a bit pathetic. The meditation/hypnosis itself is nice, a decent length with a soothing background. You have to listen each time to a whole speech on how it works first, unless, of course, you pay to get rid of it.

This is a great app! The background music is wonderful. It's very relaxing and calming. I have been searching for some way to be happy, and calm again, for two years now. Because of this app, I got to expirience that, so thank you. I would very much recommend this to anyone who is seeing this.

I just love this app. This is so gentle and kind, and reaches way deep inside my heart and mind. Thank you Surf City! Your series of apps have changed my very core to a stronger and more peaceful version of myself.

Relaxed, simple voice instruction is used to reach a suggestible hypnotic mindset. There is a number countup from 1 to 10 as you are physically and mentally relaxed by the narrator's pleasant voice. Then generally positive messages are introduced.

Thank you so much for this app! I am going through the most critical stage of life where i couldn't sleep for a week straught due to my anxiety and depression. This application literally helped me in sleeping better last night. Thank you so much for this application again. Spending a few bucks to buy it was worth it!

title: Moto Camera 2
description:
The Moto Camera 2 app is optimized for Moto devices and integrated with Google Photos. 
Features:
Never miss a moment with Quick Capture: launch the camera with a simple twist of your wrist, then twist again to switch cameras.
Moto’s smart cameras automatically adjust for light and motion for crystal clear results.
Fully integrated with Google Photos. Select the thumbnail for sharing, editing, and backup.
Get the perfect moment with Best Shot: The camera takes multiple shots before and after you capture, recognizing issues like blurred subjects or blinking eyes. It then recommends the best picture to keep. Look for the Best Shot icon in your Google Photos gallery.
Portrait mode for dual cameras to apply a blur to the background.
Cutout mode for selected dual cameras to cut out the foreground subject and add a background image of your own.
360° Panorama and Group selfie modes to capture more of your shot than ever before.
Automatic QR code scanning puts information at your fingertips: simply position camera over the QR and select search or copy.
Live filters for special effects on your photos
Launch directly into Google Lens to search what you see, get things done faster, and interact with the world.
AR Stickers for moto z4, z3, z3 play, z2 force, g7 plus, g7, g7 power, and g6 plus and motorola one zoom, vision, and action.
Rich features give you even more control:
• Photo, video, and slow motion video.
• Tap to change focus and exposure.
• Manual (professional) mode: puts you in complete control of focus, white balance, shutter speed, ISO, and exposure. 
• Common controls like flash, HDR and timer are at your fingertips.
• Comprehensive settings give you control of photo and video sizes, change to tap anywhere to capture,  and much more.

title: Sleep Well Hypnosis - For Insomnia & Deep Sleep
description:
Can’t sleep? Suffering from insomnia? Want to find out how to fall asleep fast? If you’re having difficulty sleeping and you’ve tried other sleep aid methods, like listening to sleep sounds, white noise apps, or other sleep apps to no avail, sleep meditation may be able to help. This sleep hypnosis audio session from a certified hypnotherapist is designed to help your mind and body relax so you can fall into a deep, restorative sleep. You can also enjoy the background sleeping sounds such as nature sounds and calming meditation music that accompany the voice audio. This app can help you fall asleep fast and feel more rested, even if you are fighting jet lag, insomnia, or another sleep disorder.*

◎ A single audio session of 25 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1–3 weeks
◎ Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
◎ Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
◎ Sleep Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for deep, restorative sleep
◎ Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Sleep Booster
◎ Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep
◎ Repeat sessions or loop while you sleep
◎ Continue listening to background sounds after the session ends

comments: Extortion. The female voice is amazingly pleasant...the first few seconds. But to shut her up so you can sleep right away requires a fee. Not a value-added way of increasing app registrations. Is akin to extortion. Her monotone droning instructions are painful to endure when trying to sleep. She has a nice voice. But the instructions are annoying to listen through again and again. And again. 'Fall asleep fast' as claimed? Nope. Could not fall asleep with this app even once. :/

Ive been struggling with insomnia and aniexty for a few months which literally caused me to fear going to sleep. Downloaded this app a few weeks ago and its helped me so much! I listen to it ever night and I feel so relaxed. I used to listen to the whole recording but now I'm fast asleep before the recording finishes! Would highly recommended to those suffering with aniexty and/or struggling to fall asleep!!

my go to fall asleep app.... i loved it so much so i purchased the full version and i do love it,, would be cool if it recorded noise when you fall asleep becuz im a night terror gal i have them bad.. itd be nice to hear whats going on in my surroundings when that happens to me.. also sleep apnea.. itd b nice to hear how many times i gasp for breath.. but i have an app for that too lol this is greatttt for putting me into a deeeeeep comfy sleep i dont even remember falling into big thanks

Amazing! Totally fixed my sleepless nights! I would give 5 stars but I always have to uninstall and reinstall app because its starts cracking during hypnosis and eventually shuts down...super annoying!

great sleep app I've been using it for over a year now and is definitely a favorite. Reasonable price for extra features. Easy to adjust meditation preferences. I love the progressive muscle relaxation technique & gratitude practice. And often I am asleep within minutes of starting the app now. The night's I don't sleep easily, it calms me down and helps me relax at least.

title: Kitten Match
description:
How can you refuse a helpless sweet kitten when she looks into your eyes? Help and care for the kitten, design, and decorate apartments by solving match 3 puzzles!

Welcome to Kitten Match! Here you can design and decorate the mansion with lovely talking cats by solving match-3 puzzles. If you think this is not fun enough, don’t worry, feed cats, dress them up and play with them, etc, we have what beyond your imagination! Come and join us now, cats are waiting for you!

Every sweet kitten deserves a nice human. Take care of the adorable kittens, restore mansions and adventure in the world of match 3 games!  Your beloved kitties will always be by your side!

Successful of beating colorful match 3 levels deliver you food, suits for the cats and materials that you can renovate your mansion. The more chapters you can unlock, the bond with your sweet kitten is more tightly! Don’t hesitate, meet your cute kitten pal and start your journey!

The game features: 
●Storyline: Decorate your mansions with your sweet kitten pal and encounter other cat friends!
●House design: Lights, furniture, wallpapers, floors, all on your decisions! You are the master of remodeling!
●Care for cats: feed kittens and dress them up! Pet cute cats and enjoy their purring!
●Exciting match 3 levels: challenge the puzzles, make powerful boosters, and blast gems!
●Communicate and compete with your Facebook friends! You can also send and receive free additional lives to/from them! 

Make yourself and your little kitten a cozy home and give them a feeling of family!  Thousands of pieces of furniture give you the freedom to inspire creativity and remodel when you want. Cuddly kittens will be proud of you!


Kitten Match is free to play, though some virtual items can also be purchased for real money.   

Having fun in Kitten Match? Follow us!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kittenmatch/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support team at kittenmatch_support@qiyi.com

developerAddress: 15260 Ventura Blvd, Suite 1708 Sherman Oaks, CA 91403
recentChanges:
Follows are the main update contents Kitty brought for you:
Storyline updates:
- 1 new room
- 70 new levels
Halloween special event:
- 1 new event room: Shrieking Castle
- New item: Halloween Outfits

Thank you for your support for Kitten Match. Happy gaming!
comments: I really like it. It has a fun storyline, nice decor choices and overall a nice game. Its addictive and its cute. The cats are adorable and I love how you meet new ones as the story goes on. I really do like the idea of having a cat area built just for the cats and how people can come visit and like it. It's a fun, cute and addictive game and I really enjoy it.

I love the challenge! It surprised me that Kitten Match isn't a game geared for children. The levels start out easy but they get challenging as you win and move up to higher levels. The story line is adorable and there are many different facets in the game. It's kept me interested and actually looking forward to play it and help the kittens with a variety of tasks. Try it... you'll like it too!

Although this is one of my fave games which I only started playing in the last week and the story with the kittens is really adorable they just make it too freaking hard if you have no boosters to get through a level. Can't buy anything on this phone as I use my graphics handle so I'm like stuck and have no way to get any boosters when I really need them. I'm just devastated because I really really love the story and the renovation aspect of this game.

This is a fun game. I'm not a mad fan of matching games but this one plays fair. Rewards are generous, there is no constant stream of ads and decorating is fun. Not does it cheat - if you have to use coins to extend a game you usually only have to do it once. Graphics are good and the cats are cute. I like it.

Love playing the game. Love the cats and their costumes. The ads are not annoying. Just wish that when you play multiple boards that your bombs, ball etc. Would be able to go to next board. Also wish that it was easier to get rewards, some puzzles need more moves or if at the end of no more moves that if there are balls, bombs, line cleaners etc, that they could do a last blast. I am looking forward for the next update .

title: Trivia Royale
description:
Can you outsmart 1000 other contestants in the ultimate battle of wits? Welcome to the Biggest Trivia Tournament in the World!

In Trivia Royale, you face off in a battle of brains against thousands of players from across the globe. Use your wits to stump the opposition. The more players you strike out, the closer you get to becoming a Royale. Ultimate victory is rewarded by being crowned a ‘Royale’ and gaining access to the exclusive Royale Lounge. But with over 100,000 questions and answers, and more added daily, Royales have to keep their skills sharp to stay on the throne.

Do you have what it takes to be the last one standing and become a Royale?

Features:
- Compete against 1000 other players in the worlds biggest trivia tournament.
- Battle Royale meets Trivia in a race to be top of the quiz mountain.
- Reign supreme & win to become a Royale & gain access to the exclusive ‘Royale Lounge’.
- Live Events gives you the opportunity to use your extensive knowledge of a single topic. Answer a set number of questions and collect new rewards.
- Hundreds & thousands of questions & answers, and more added daily across multiple topics.
- Create your unique avatar, personalize it in millions of ways for the ultimate expression.
- Innovative ‘Game Face’ face-tracking technology brings your avatar fully to life.

Support email: support@teatime.games
Community guidelines: https://www.teatime.games/community-guidelines
Please note that under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play Trivia Royale. The game also requires a network connection.

Warning: A very small percentage of players may experience epileptic seizures due to flashing lights or movements.

recentChanges: Exploring topics just became a whole lot easier. With this update, you can search for your favorite topic instead of having to scroll through our ever-expanding list of topics. And to make the navigation of the list easier, we decided to display it in alphabetical order. But wait, there is more. On top of the list, you will see our new and updated topics, your favorites, and a curated collection of amazing topics.
comments: It's a good app. I'm getting aggravated waiting for Android customisation of the avatars though. They're busy adding new topics (almost rushing to add, that word spelling is sometimes wrong) so they're doing something just not delivering on avatar customisation (app itself says coming soon but it's lying, it's been saying that since I downloaded the app MONTHS ago) it's as if they can't be a***d

Still no customization for android user (played this 2 months ago and back now. New feature for android my ass. Too many obsure usa question, too many bots, too many ads (skip the ad for more ads). I spent money on this game, worst mistake ever.
It's okay. But it still hasn't updated the avatars for Android users to be able to customize them. Also, this app still has an issue with shutting itself off when I didn't request it to do so.
Absolutely LOVE! THE perfect one on one trivia match! Questions moderately difficult to where one of you are going to know 90% of it. Just perfect. My first review on any game ever!
The game is good. But it still does not has the feature where android users can customise their avatars. Thats the only reason i have deducted 2 stars.

title: RAID: Shadow Legends
description:
Battle your way through a visually-stunning realistic fantasy RPG with hundreds of Champions from 13 playable factions.
 
To save the world of Teleria, you will recruit its most legendary warriors from the forces of Light and Darkness. You must train them to fight together, mold them into living weapons, and assemble the greatest raiding party ever seen.
 
Download now to join the fight!
 
 ⋇FEATURES⋇
 
COLLECT POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Collect hundreds of warriors from 13 factions. Assemble balanced teams of Sorcerers, Skinwalkers, Undead, Knights, Elves, and more to defeat your enemies - then recruit them to your side!
 
FIGHT EPIC BOSS BATTLES
Vanquish dozens of challenging bosses for loot, XP, and special Champion drops! Then go beat them again for more powerful gear.
 
PVP ARENA
Go head-to-head with other players to unlock special gear and climb the rankings in intense arena battles. Two teams go in – only one comes out.
 
VISCERAL 3D ARTWORK
Beautiful, fully-rendered 3D heroes offer stunning detail down to the cracks in their armor. Watch them battle through vivid environments with thousands of unique skill and attack animations.
 
DEVELOP AND MANAGE YOUR BASTION
Upgrade your own personal fortress to manage your Shards, train your Champions, and prepare them for arena battles, dungeon runs, and story campaigns.
 
DEEP STRATEGIC PLAY
Make tough decisions and equip your champions with powerful artifacts to aid them in their quest. Rank them up to unleash devastating special skills, AOE attacks, healing powers and more as you lead them in combat.
 
MASSIVE PVE CAMPAIGN MAP
Experience epic dark fantasy done right through 12 spectacular locations spread over a sprawling, fully-voiced story campaign. 
 
HASSLE-FREE AUTOPLAY
Autoplay levels to spend less time grinding and more time exploring Teleria.
 
PLEASE NOTE:
 
• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. 
RAID: Shadow Legends is available in English, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Ukrainian, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified, Korean, Turkish, Japanese, and Portuguese.
 
Official Website: https://plarium.com/
Support: raid.support@plarium.com
Community: https://plarium.com/forum/en/raid-shadow-legends/
Privacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy/ 
Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms/

recentChanges:
New in version 2.30.0:

FEATURES:
- New Faction Wars completion reward. Earn 3 Stars on every Stage to get Lydia the Deathsiren. Not available from Shards.
- New Avatars available at the Bazaar.

CHANGES, FIXES, IMPROVEMENTS:
- Mercy System is live. See Info panel at the Portal.
- Added FAQ.
- Classic Arena Rewards must now be collected from Tiers tab after refresh.
- Fixed Tag Team Arena progress bar.
- Giant Slayer or Warmaster Masteries will no longer trigger effects based on target's death.
comments: While the only thing you do in this game is level up characters, it is surprisingly complex. I've played mostly for free(I bought some legendary tomes, they are hard to get). The game is very stingy in what it grants you. You have to be patient, unless you spend money. I've been at it for about six months. He'll hades has some excellent strategy guides on yuotube.

Been playing the game for over a year now, and I had to drop the ratings. I love and enjoy the characters, great designs. Also, the game play is awesome. I don't like how the better characters are coded in a way to where you cannot obtain them if you don't spend money on shards. You need a ton of shards to get them; afterwords, you need more money for gems, enegery for leveling, also making your characters stronger. The tournaments are fun to a point.

It's okay. The campaign gets a bit repetitive where you end up kinda just watching your characters walk down hallways as you tap here or there to attack or buff. That's my only real complaint, the graphics and design is lovely. The various in-game purchase ads are a bit annoying since you'll sometimes have to X out of 5+ windows of them, but I get it. If this is your type of game, you'll most likely enjoy it.

Fun, in depth game play with lots to do. Awesome job on that. The only issue i see is the constant pop ups. Advertising promotional deals is great. However, you take it too far. It's more than just "from time to time". It's ALL the time. Calm down a bit on the advertising and people will calm down a bit on complaining about it.

2 stars for good graphics but that's all that's good. If you have an issue and report it in the "Game bug" forums thread, all they do is ask for screen shots, well the problem with that, mobile phone or Android versions there's no option to add screen shots. I have mentioned this in forum threads and emailed you a s s holes time and time again. What's the point of support? Everyone should record all battles Then replay them in slow motion.. you'll find that you've been screwed since the start.

comments: I don't listen to it every day but once or twice at three at the most and have noticed a big change in my desire eat better and healthier foods.
Helps me sleep and also helps me be more aware of what I eat.

I suffer from insomnia & eating disirders, this app addresses both. And delivers! Very soothing. Surprised it sells this low. Excellent quality app, sound, graphics, navigation. Joy to use. Thank you. Will revert with my results after a month's use. Right now highly recommended as a sleeping aid... And go for the booster in the paid subscription.

I upgraded to paid version. I usually fall asleep with in 5 minutes and listen to it 2 times (option in settings) with hypnotic booster. Not certain how it works scientifically, but it seems to curb cravings without an internal battle.

I must admit I got this app with a high amount of scepticism. However after about 2 weeks of daily use it has assisted me in reinforcing mindful eating habits. I was so inspired I went on to purchase the "pro" version.

title: Q&A Flashcard App for LTME & Neurocritical Care
description:
The Q&A Flashcard Study System App for Long Term Monitoring in Epilepsy and Neurocritical Care is available for both Android and iOS platforms. The app contains 280 questions and answers in many LTM in Epilepsy and critical care/ICU continuous EEG topics, such as neuroanatomy & physiology, seizure classification, anti-epileptic medications and treatments, localization of sensorimotor cortex, functional and motor-sensory mapping, waveform identification, electrographic correlates, and seizure semiology. Detailed references are included for each answer. Convenient features of the app include:
Swipe navigation
Zoom function for all images
Shuffle by topic category or shuffle all questions
Note page available for and unique to each question number
Option to start where you previously left off, start from the home page, or start in a new topic category

Powered by diacriTech Private Limited, Chennai, India.
descriptionHTML:
The Q&A Flashcard Study System App for Long Term Monitoring in Epilepsy and Neurocritical Care is available for both Android and iOS platforms. The app contains 280 questions and answers in many LTM in Epilepsy and critical care/ICU continuous EEG topics, such as neuroanatomy & physiology, seizure classification, anti-epileptic medications and treatments, localization of sensorimotor cortex, functional and motor-sensory mapping, waveform identification, electrographic correlates, and seizure semiology. Detailed references are included for each answer. Convenient features of the app include:
Swipe navigation
Zoom function for all images
Shuffle by topic category or shuffle all questions
Note page available for and unique to each question number
Option to start where you previously left off, start from the home page, or start in a new topic category

Powered by diacriTech Private Limited, Chennai, India.
summary: This flashcard app contains 280 Q&A about LTME and critical care/ICU cEEG topics
recentChanges: This is a great way to prepare for the ABRET CLTM board exam while on-the-go!
comments: Does nothing at login screen, cant get in, no prompt if wrong sign in, etc

title: FRAG Pro Shooter
description:
Get ready to discover FRAG PRO SHOOTER, a free shooter game by Oh BiBi! Play explosive 1v1 duels against players from all over the world with this amazing FPS designed for your phone. 

BECOME A TOP FRAG SHOOTER!
- Join more than 50 million players worldwide.
- Meet other players for short but crazy battles!
- Control your character in first person or third person views.
- Discover the new co-op mode! Cooperate with another player to defeat your opponents!

PERSONALIZE YOUR GAMEPLAY FOR 1v1 MATCHES
- Switch between your 5 characters and gain the advantage!
- Being dead isn't that bad: regain life instantly with another character!
- Build your battle team to fit your game style: attack, defense, etc...

CREATE YOUR OWN TEAM
- Over 80 characters for building your dream team and becoming the best shooter.
- Customize your characters with powerful and exciting skins!
- Upgrade your characters to make them even more awesome!

MAKE FRIENDS, RIVALS, AND BECOME A SUPERSTAR!!
- Expand your FAN BASE to become popular!!
- Join a club or create your own to make your team famous!
- Record and share your games and decks, and check out others’ to become better!

TIPS
- Every character has their strengths and weaknesses: try them all to see which ones are best for you!
- Attack the enemy target to get lots of points, but beware of ambushes!
- Check your missions for amazing rewards!

FRAG PRO SHOOTER is a match for any rival PC or console game. It has everything a shooter needs: FPS (first person shooter) and TPS (third person shooter) options, auto shoot, and all the controls are adjustable to fit your playing style! It’s no secret that FRAG PRO SHOOTER has more than 50 million players, so come join the fun!

Follow us to get news and updates:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2OBrAxbgGV4lxrIiWUr3Ag
https://www.facebook.com/FRAGTheGame/
https://twitter.com/FRAGTheGame
